Job Description:
-	Prepare budgets and submit estimates for program costs as part of campaign plan development.
-	Plan and prepare advertising and promotional material to increase sales of products or services, working with customers, company officials, sales departments and advertising agencies.
-	 Assist MM with annual budget development.
-	 Inspect layouts and advertising copy and edit scripts, audio and video tapes, and other promotional material for adherence to specifications.
-	 Identify and develop contacts for promotional campaigns and industry programs that meet identified buyer targets such as dealers, distributors, or consumers.
-	 Gather and organize information to plan advertising campaigns.
-	Confer with department heads and/or staff to discuss topics such as contracts, selection of advertising media, or product to be advertised.
-	Confer with clients to provide marketing or technical advice.
-	Monitor and analyze sales promotion results to determine cost effectiveness of promotion campaigns.
-	Read trade journals and professional literature to stay informed on trends, innovations, and changes that affect media planning.
-	Provide presentation and product demonstration support during the introduction of new products and services to field staff and customers.
-	Direct, motivate, and monitor the mobilization of a campaign team to advance campaign goals.
-	Plan and execute advertising policies and strategies for organizations.
-	Track program budgets and expenses and campaign response rates to evaluate each campaign based on program objectives and industry norms.
-	Train and direct workers engaged in developing and producing advertisements.
-	Represent company at trade association meetings to promote products.
Job Requirement:
-	Degree in BBA in Marketing or similar  
-	Minimum two to three years experience in similar role
-	Good communication in English for both speaking and writing
-	Other languages spoken is a plus
-	Willing to travel
-	Analytical thinking skills
-	Experience in Marketing is a plus
-	Be able to prioritize the tasks and work under pressure
-	Possess project management skills

Company Profile:
Canadia Bank Plc. was established on 11th November 1991 as “Canadia Gold & Trust Corporation Ltd.”, joint-venture between Cambodian - Canadians and the National Bank of Cambodia (Central Bank of Cambodia). The bank’s management consisted of former staff of the National Bank of Cambodia and its Cambodian – Canadian shareholders.

The main activities were based on gold transactions, gold plaque manufacturing and lending to local merchants. On 19th April 1993 the name was changed into CANADIA BANK LTD., licensed as a Commercial Bank with the National Bank of Cambodia and registered with the Ministry of Commerce. On 16th December 2003 the name of the bank changed into CANADIA BANK PLC. (Public Limited Company).

Since privatization in 1998 the Bank has become the largest local bank in Cambodia. With a worldwide network of correspondent banking relationships and a solid base of local and international customers CANADIA BANK PLC holds commanding market shares in loans as well as deposits. The bank offers a wide range of financial services through its Head Office and its more than 50 branches in Phnom Penh and major cities throughout the country.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Recruitment Officer  023 868 222 No. 315, Ang Doung St. Corner Monivong Blvd, Phnom Penh, Cambodia.  023 868 222

Job Description:
1. Finance Officers

Responsibilities:
• Assist in enhancing analytical capabilities within the team in order to better understand
the underlying business performance drivers.
• Prepare, consolidate and monitor the budgets in accordance with the bank’s overall
strategic business plan.
• Monitor performance against budget.
• Assist in preparing consolidated financial statements.
• Assist in the assets and liabilities management of the Bank.
• Analyze the operations and business drivers and identify issues and emerging trends.
• Prepare management accounting report and provide analysis and advice on management
accounting issues.
• Must perform other duties as assigned.

2. Compliance Officers

Responsibilities:
•	Coordinate with all BCOs (Branch Compliance Officer) on ongoing Transaction monitoring, focused on KYC & AML
•	Prepare the report on KYC & AML for HO and gather reports from all branches for quarterly report on the same subject
•	Command and track the customer and transaction within the T24 system
•	Check on Account Opening Documents for Compliance monitoring and risk control
•	Check daily Remittance Transaction and reports
•	Assist in Compliance testing on Internal Control
Job Requirement:
1. Finance Officers

Requirements:
• Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance and Banking is required and Completed FIA/pursuing ACCA is preferred.
• Fluent in Speaking/Reading/Writing English and Khmer are necessarily required.
Ability to communicate in Chinese is an advantage.
• Must have fluent computer literacy: MS Word, Excel, and Power Point.
• At least one or two years working experience in a Financial Institution or any of big four
audit firms.
• Having sound knowledge of management accounting and financial reporting techniques.
• Having previous experience in budgeting is an advantage.
• Willing to work under pressure and over time.

1. Finance Officers

Requirements:
•	Holding Bachelor Degree in Management and Business Administration or Law, or equivalent
•	Pursuing CAT is preferable
•	Must have good command in both spoken and written English
•	Computer literacy i.e. Khmer and English Typing, MS Word, Excel, Power Point, and so on
•	Past relevant working experience will be an advantage, but fresh from university are also welcome
•	Good at Communication Skill
•	Willing and receptive to work upon assignment

Job Description:
• Provide a safe, caring, nurturing and stimulating environment in which a child (children) can develop
• Responsibilities also include as caring for a child's needs, helping children with schoolwork, organizing and engaging in activities and disciplining
• Transport and assist children to classes, play ground, routine medical appointments with school nurse, in the sleeping area, the library, lounging area, and the lunch area
- Assist the Assistant teachers in any circumstances related to childcare within the school premises
- Create a stimulating, nurturing, and safe environment for the children
- Supervise the children’s activities at all times
- Plan and prepare meals and bottles for, and feed, the children.
- Dress the children, place the children down for naps and bedtime, bathe the children, change diapers
- Potty train the children
- Perform housework related to child care, including washing the children’s clothes, cleaning up after meals, tidying play areas, and washing bottles
- Teach the children good social manners
- Play with the children, both indoors and outdoors
- Plan and lead educational activities, including reading, with the children
- Discipline the children, when necessary
- Drive the children to and from activities
- Administer medicine to the children
Job Requirement:
- Diploma in Early Childhood Education, Nursing or any related field 
- Good English communication skill
- Experience working with baby and kids less than 2 years-old
- Good classroom management and creation more activities for kids.
- A genuine care, concern and love
- Good communication and negotiation skills
- Strong commitment to participate in school development 
- Strong personality and good common sense
- Ability to understand difference cultures

** Interested applicants, please submit your CV and cover letter to our recruitment unit via both email addresses: nhelkhemara@gmail.com and info@brillianceintlschool.com or send directly to our school address # 19, St 208, Boeng Raing, Daun Penh, Phnom Penh.

Job Requirement: #NAME?
Company Profile:
As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.

Company Profile:
Phillip Bank Plc. is a member of PhillipCapital Group which is headquartered in Singapore, and established since 1975. The Group offers a full range of quality and innovative services to retail, corporate and institutional customers and currently operates in over 15 countries including Australia, Cambodia, China (as well as Hong Kong), France, India, Indonesia, Japan, Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand, Turkey, UK, UAE, USA and Vietnam.  

We were established in Cambodia in 2009 under HwangDBS Commercial Bank Plc. and in 2014, PhillipCapital Group bought it over and renamed it as Phillip Bank. In year 2020, the merger between Phillip Bank Plc. and KREDIT Microfinance Institution Plc. concluded successfully and made us one of the largest commercial bank with more than 80 branches in Cambodia.

Employee experience is our priority in Phillip Bank, in the process of achieving our corporate goals, we will put every effort towards our people’s growth. We are proud of our bank’s culture where: We treat our employee as family members; we always strive to meet our customer’s expectation and we believe in benefitting the communities.

Job Description:
- Define and implement a digital development pipeline to position the bank as market leading in key areas such as sales functionality, onsite customer experience, UX design and reporting.

- Ensure that the digital channel is appropriately integrated into the bank’s overall customer engagement and sales strategy.

- Provide actionable insights to the wider organization to achieve the bank’s commercial targets.

- Develop and maintain an effective suite of reporting tools to drive maximum insight from the digital channel.

- Work with key internal and external stakeholders; deliver against project timelines.
Job Requirement:
- Degree in Finance and Banking or any related field.

- Minimum 5 years experience in the commercial banking sector, coupled with experience with digital marketing, channel strategy, and project management.

- Passion for web and mobile technology is essential.

- Language proficiency in English and Khmer is required. 

REMUNERATION 

Phillip Bank offers a career in banking, competitive salary, 13th month salary, performance incentives and others. 

***HOW TO APPLY 

Interested candidates is welcomed to send your last updated resume, a copy of Cambodian ID card and a recent passport size photograph not later than 26 January 2015 to the following:

Phillip Bank Plc 

Ground Floor of B-Office Centre, # 61-64 Norodom Blvd Corner Street 306, Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang 1, Khan Chamkamorn, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. Or email us at: careers@phillipbank.com.kh

For additional information, please visit: www.phillipbank.com.kh

Contact Person: Ms. Nhauo Sokha Vatey

(All applications will be treated in strict confidentiality)
Company Profile:
Phillip Bank Plc. is a member of PhillipCapital Group which is headquartered in Singapore, and established since 1975. The Group offers a full range of quality and innovative services to retail, corporate and institutional customers and currently operates in over 15 countries including Australia, Cambodia, China (as well as Hong Kong), France, India, Indonesia, Japan, Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand, Turkey, UK, UAE, USA and Vietnam.  

We were established in Cambodia in 2009 under HwangDBS Commercial Bank Plc. and in 2014, PhillipCapital Group bought it over and renamed it as Phillip Bank. In year 2020, the merger between Phillip Bank Plc. and KREDIT Microfinance Institution Plc. concluded successfully and made us one of the largest commercial bank with more than 80 branches in Cambodia.

Employee experience is our priority in Phillip Bank, in the process of achieving our corporate goals, we will put every effort towards our people’s growth. We are proud of our bank’s culture where: We treat our employee as family members; we always strive to meet our customer’s expectation and we believe in benefitting the communities.

Job Description:
- Maintain the computerized accounting system Quick Books software for HO and produce financial and related reports timely and accurately as per requirement.
- Oversee and prepare cash flow control of safe-box, cash count, bank record, bank reconciliation, payroll list, payroll slip and manage all financial transfer requirements.
- Develop and manage the annual budget including the operating and various contracts.
- Monitor actual expenditure versus budgets of head office periodically.
- Establish, maintain and reconcile petty cash, cash of safe-box and bank statements
- Issue cheques for all accounts due
- Reconcile the accounts payable and accounts receivable
- Maintain an appropriate filing system to include all essential finance relevant documentation of the whole GNC to ensure accurate tracking and documentation for audit purposes.
- Maintain the accounts payable and accounts receivable systems in order to ensure complete and accurate records of all moneys
- Develops and implements accounting procedures by analyzing current procedures; recommending changes.
- Assist finance team of Head Office to monitor expenditure of all projects, evaluate accounting and internal control systems and identify and communicate control risks, potential consequences and recommendations.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree majoring in finance or audit
- 3 year-experience in accounting or audit
- Knowledge of finance, accounting, budgeting and cost controlling procedure 
- Fluency in English 
- Computer Skill in Quick Books and Microsoft Offices
- Excellent organizational and communication skills
- Honest and trustworthy, hard-working and willing to learn

Job Description:
** Community Development Facilitator [1 full-time position based in Cheung Aek Community Development Project (CDP), Phnom Penh]


- Primary responsibility in managing all health programs at Choeng Aek Ural Community Development Project
- Program development and planning, peer reviewer and applicant relations, 
- Serves as the primary liaison to the program evaluation working group, maintaining expertise and contributing to innovation in research evaluation.
- Solve problems frequently requiring analysis of unique issues/problems without precedent and/or structure. May manage programs that include formulating strategies and administering policies, processes, and resources; functions with a high degree of autonomy.
- Work in cooperation with all health relevant staffs such as GNC, Health Post, Health Center, Referral Hospital and other National Hospitals in Phnom Penh that have agreement with the Organization for Child Health Insurance (CHI) or other health programs
- Spread up-to-date information to community people about how to take care of health
- Be highly responsible for three main sources of work. (1) Coordinate or manage Health Post Program. (2) Facilitate or run Child Health Support (CHS). (3) Manage budget related to health program and make clear report to submit to Community Development Project (CDP) Manager
- Attend monthly meeting required by Phnom Penh Municipal Department of Health and report to CDP Manager about the meeting result
- Coordinate with Health Post Staff to prepare checklist in advance of all necessary materials or medicines to be purchased for use at the post
- Monthly check all medical equipment installed at the post to verify all purchased materials are available at the post. 
- If any problem happens—unacceptable manner of Health Post staff to community people, etc.—, must report or discuss with CA CDP Manager immediately to look for solution in order to solve the issue before it extends more serious. 
- Set up training topics before conducting health awareness campaigns and make reports after those events are completed. 
- Manage schedules for visitors, who are Cambodians, Koreans or others who want to see the program operation assigned by GNC management team.
- Update all health care information and health program activities by making clear reports and put them in the good order, which is easy to be accessed. Besides, PowerPoint is very necessary for visitor internal and external presentation.
- Keep the deadline of any report required by GNC, especially monthly, quarterly, semi-annual and annual report, which is related to health program.
- Do other tasks required by GNC.
Job Requirement:
- A Bachelor’s Degree in Social Science or Health Science with exposure to implementing programs in Health Insurance
- A minimum of three years’ experience in preventive and behavior change program. 
- Knowledge of Reproductive Health, HIV/AIDS, STI, Drug use and Gender. 
- Having a good communication skill and willing to work hard
- Experience in project management in health sectors
- Be strong at reporting both Khmer and English. 
- Facilitation skill in a high standard of ethical manner
- Good computer skills in MS Word, Excel & Power-point

Job Description:
** Internal Auditor [1 full-time position based in Head Office with frequently travel to provinces, Phnom Penh.]

- Understand the nature, purpose and scope of auditing and internal review, including the role of internal audit in providing assurance on risk management and on the control frame work of GNC.
- Identify risk, describe the procedures undertaken in the planning process, plan work to meet the objective of the audit or review assignment and draft the content of plan. 
- Describe and evaluate accounting and internal control systems and identify and communicate control risks, potential consequences and recommendations.
- Explain and evaluate sources of evidence, describe the nature, timing and extent of tests on transactions and account balances.
- Evaluate finding, investigate inconsistencies, modify the work program as necessary, review subsequent events, and justify and prepare appropriate reports for users within to the organization, including recommendations to enhance business performance.
- Ensure the Finance manual exist in each office and has been followed
- Ensure the cash count and cash book are correct and approved
- Ensure the bank statement and bank book are correct and approved
- Ensure all the money received is correctly recorded and make sure that there is a sign indicating that all persons making a payment to GNC should request a receipt.
- Ensure all cash received has been correctly accounted for by viewing all receipts and correctly coded
- Ensure all invoices/receipts are translated into English
- Ensure where possible check validity of expenses
- Ensure all appropriate documentation is with the voucher 
- Ensure the vouchers are correctly authorized in accordance with the authority delegation
- Ensure that the vouchers have been numbered and entered correctly in the QuickBooks
- Ensure that the reports and the ledger have been checked
- Ensure any recommendation amendments has been followed up
- Ensure the variance finance report has been explained
- Ensure the items considered to be assets are on the assets register
- Ensure the schedule for physical check of assets is followed 
- Perform a review of the internal controls in the office
- Assist in managing all revolving fund of GNC
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in accounting and finance or audit
- At least 2 years working experience in audit
- Strong English skill both written and spoken;
- Must be well experienced, competent and confident working with computers (particularly Microsoft Excel and Microsoft Word)
- Excellent organizational and communication skills
- Honest and trustworthy, hard-working and willing to learn

Job Description:
Our client is one of the private Microfinance and was established as a credit unit of the Federation of Cambodian Rice Millers Associations to alleviate the capital constraints of rice mill entrepreneurs who lacked access to credit to expand their production. Currently, we are seeking for qualified candidate to fill the position Loan Compliance Officer. 

 +Responsibilities: 

- Regularly monitor and assist branches in their compliance to the Company’s credit policy, procedures, guidelines, operational plan and other related documents.
- Support branches in operational matters, answer branch requests and questions.
- Intervene in field tasks directly as prescribed by credit policy and procedures, e.g. participation in loan assessment.
- Contribute to the review and improvement of credit policy, procedures, guidelines, forms and other related documents; prepare and disseminate Company resolutions and memos to the branches accordingly.

Risk Control Function
- Identify and monitor risks in the loan portfolio and in the credit function.
- Propose and implement mitigation solutions to credit risk.
- Help branches safeguard a good loan portfolio quality, including field staff training, on-site inspection and follow-up, watching out for early warning signs and assistance in the recovery of problem loans.

Other Functions
- Perform business research and analysis as required.
- Contribute to cross-functional issues as required in cooperation with other Company Departments.
- Build and maintain good reputation and relationship with all operational stakeholders, including clients, local authorities, the courts, other microfinance institutions and others.
- Other duties related with the position and that may be assigned from time to time.


 +Requirement: 

- Bachedor Degree in Business Administration, Accounting or related field
- At least two year of practical microfinance or banking experience in credit management.
- Strong commitment to work, able to perform multitasks within tough deadlines, ready to work occasionally overtime and to travel to the provinces.

 +Conditions and Benefits:

- Working time: 7:30am-12:00am | 1:00pm-5:00pm
- Working days: Monday-Friday
- Holidays: Saturday, Sunday & Legal Holidays
- Khmer New Year and Pchumbend Bonus (50% of gross salary).
- Annual Incentive
- Annual Provident Fund
- 24-hour insurance.
- Salary range: $300-$350

Job Description:

with exceptional people skills and the ability to present ideas and negotiate. Good problem solving skills are essential. IT is increasingly important for managers working on site and in the office, so building up skills in this area is vital.

- Preparing the site and liaising with other construction professionals such as architects, engineers, buyers, estimators and surveyors before construction work starts

- Planning ahead to prevent problems on site before they occur, for example, planning the delivery and storage of equipment and materials
- Making safety inspections of the site when work is underway and ensuring regulations relating to health, safety and the environment (HSE) are adherred to

- Using construction management software packages to plan smooth work flows
- Communicating with a range of people including the client, subcontractors, suppliers, the public and the workforce

Job Description:
Our client is one of the private Microfinance and was established as a credit unit of the Federation of Cambodian Rice Millers Associations to alleviate the capital constraints of rice mill entrepreneurs who lacked access to credit to expand their production. Currently, we are seeking for qualified candidate to fill the position  Information Technology Officer.

 +Responsibilities: 

- Ensure the regular back up of core MIS system and data/reports from various departments and micro-finance'website   database.
- Ensure the implementation of Our ICT Policy according to the instruction of IT Manager.
- Install and configure computer hardware, software, systems, networks, printers, scanners and more  Plan and undertake scheduled maintenance upgrades
- Communicate to computer users to determine the nature of problems
- Investigate, diagnose and solve computer software and hardware faults
- Repaire equipment and replacing parts
- Check computer equipment for electrical safety
- Conduct monitoring and maintaining computer systems and networks
- Troubleshooting system and network problems and diagnosing and solving hardware or software faults
- Provide support, including procedural documentation and relevant reports
- Prioritize and manage many open cases at one time
- Conduct electrical safety checks on computer equipment.


 +Requirement: 

- A sound working knowledge of computer (MS-Office,e-mail
- Internet and accounting system)
- Bachelor degree in Information Technology (programming, networking and administration)


 +Conditions and Benefits:

- Working time: 7:30am-12:00am | 1:00pm-5:00pm
- Working days: Monday-Friday
- Holidays: Saturday, Sunday & Legal Holidays
- Khmer New Year and Pchumbend Bonus (50% of gross salary).
- Annual Incentive 
- Annual Provident Fund
- 24-hour insurance.
- Salary range: $250-$300

Only short-list candidates will be contacted for an interview.

yes housed more than 1,000 employees both local and expatriate. Job Description:
1. Supervise sales team

2. Assist the Sales Manager in leading, directing and motivating the sales team in order to achieve the overall corporate sales objectives and targets

3. Assist the Sales Manager in revising and implementing the sales strategies and execution plans.

4. Assist the Sales Manager in generating sales opportunities by identifying appropriate business targets.

5. Assist the Sales Manager in providing a professional and excellent level of customer service with existing and new customers

6. Assist Sales Manager in ensuring all marketing and promotional activities and assigned duties are executed effectively to optimize results

7.Handle customer issues, resolution and communicate escalated issues to the Sales Manager

8.Assist with sales persons questions, concerns and product/service questions

9.Make sure all sales persons adhere to company policies and procedures

10.Communicate all customer complaints, employee relations issues, concerns, and incidents to Sales Manager

11.Monitor competitor's activities relating to marketing campaigns and promotional activities, including sales off-take and reports to Sales Manager 

12. Monitor the activities of Sub-Distributors to ensure sales targets are achieved and promotional activities of the Company are properly executed.  Report any unusual incidents to Sales Manager

13. Monitor sales calls of sales team and ensure sales are calling on customers to achieve sales targets

14. Report any dishonest behavior or suspicion of dishonest behavior, of sales to the Sales Manager immediately
Job Requirement:
.Male, Age 25 above.
.Graduated bachelor’s degree in Marketing /Management or related fields. 
.Candidate must possess minimum qualification
Proven track record in supervising a highly skilled, motivated, successful and results-oriented sales force.
.Strong leadership qualities with good communication and interpersonal skills.
.Able to operate in a fast-paced and changing market environment.
2-3 years experience as Sales Supervisor in the FMCG industry is essential
Good in Microsoft office (Ms. Word, Ms. Excel) or Internet/email.
Experience in van sales an advantage
Strong analytical mind with high level of maturity.
Self-driven and resulted oriented and able to supervise a sales team.

Company Profile:
Well-positioned in Siem Reap Central Area, next to the Siem Reap Arts Center Night Market alongside the Siem Reap river, Angkor Orchid Central Hotel is a luxury brand new boutique hotel and is the ideal point of departure for your excursions in Siem Reap. From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all the lively city has to offer. With the city's main attractions such as Phsar Kandal and Pub Street which is just 2 to 3 minutes walk , visitors to the hotel will just love its strategic location. The hotel is also surrounded by many restaurants of just about any type of cuisine and also many local food stalls and eateries that will entice you! Our location is indeed unbeatable by many other boutique hotels.

At Angkor Orchid Central Hotel, the excellent service and superior facilities make for an unforgettable stay. The hotel provides a restaurant, rooftop Sky Cafe, concierge, business center, Tour Desk and many more dedicated services to ensure our guests the greatest comfort while exploring Siem Reap.

In addition, our guestrooms are facing city view and come with a balcony where guest can step out and enjoy the fresh air and the tranquility of Siem Reap. The rooms also feature a variety of comforts such as seating area, wireless internet access, mini bar, bathrobes, cable tv and more to please all our discerning guest. The hotel's recreational facilities, which include rooftop garden facing the city and in-house massage services are designed for the guest relaxation. Whatever your reason for visiting Siem Reap, Angkor Orchid Central Hotel is the perfect hotel for an exhilarating and exciting stay.
Contact Info: Contact Information Seyha KHY ( Mr  )  098 500 805 / 017 247 800 Wat Damnak ( Behind Siem Reap Art Center Night Market), Siem Reap, Cambodia  098 500 805 / 017 247 800

job title: អ្នកលក់ ប្រចាំភ្នំពេញ (ប្រញាប់)
position: អ្នកលក់ ប្រចាំភ្នំពេញ (ប្រញាប់)
Job Description:
•	ដឹកផលិតផលក្រុមហ៊ុន ដើរលក់តាមកាលវិភាគលក់ទៅដល់គ្រប់ប្រភេទហាងទាំងអស់ដែលបានបែងចែករួចក្នុងតំបន់របស់ខ្លួន
•	ធានា និងផ្គត់ផ្គង់នូវផលិតផលរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ឲ្យបានគ្រប់គ្រាន់ដល់អតិថិជនទាំងអស់របស់ខ្លួន
•	ព្យាយាមធ្វើចរចារយ៉ាងណាលក់ផលិតផលដល់អតិថិជនដោយលក់លុយសុទ្ធ ប្រសើរជាងដាក់ឲ្យជំពាក់។
•	ជួយធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយ ត្រួតពិនិត្យការតាំងផលិតផលឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ ដើម្បីអតិថិជនងាយឃើញ និងងាយចាប់អារម្មណ៍ និងងាយស្រួលយក
•	ជួយបិទផ្ទាំងរូបភាពផ្សព្វផ្សាយផលិតផល តាំងសំបកកេះ និងចងបដា នៅតាមហាងនីមួយៗ ជាដើម

•	ជាប្រចាំត្រូវធ្វើការបង្វិលស្តុក មានដូចជា ស្តុកមកមុនត្រូវដាក់លក់មុន ឯស្តុកមកក្រោយត្រូវលក់តាមក្រោយ (FIFO) និងមិនអនុញ្ញាតឲ្យមានស្តុកដែលមានអាយុលើសពី៦ខែ នៅលើទីផ្សារបានឡើយ។
•	ត្រូវតាមដាន និងមានយុទ្ធវិធីដោះស្រាយ ចំពោះបំណុលដែលអតិថិជនជំពាក់លើសការកំណត់។
•	គ្រប់គ្រងស្តុកចេញ ស្តុកចូល ដែលត្រូវមានកំណត់ត្រា និងរបាយការណ៍លក់ជាក់ស្តែងជារៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃ និងរាយការជូនប្រធានផ្នែកលក់(បំពេញCall Card)
•	តាមដានសកម្មភាពរបស់គូប្រជែង និងធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ការងាររបស់ខ្លួន ជូនប្រធានផ្នែកលក់
•	ពង្រីក និងបើកហាងថ្មី ឲ្យមានផលិផលក្រុមហ៊ុនបានគ្រប់គ្រាន់ ជារៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃ ឲ្យដល់ចំនួនហាងដែលមានស្រាប់នៅក្នុងតំបន់របស់ខ្លួន (បើសិនមានការស្នើសុំជំពាក់លើសពីការកំណត់ ត្រូវតែមានការអនុញាត្ត និងសំរេច ពីប្រធានផ្នែកលក់ ឬនាយកគ្រប់គ្រងដេប៉ូ)
•	ធ្វើយ៉ាងណារក្សាឲ្យបាននូវទំនាក់ទំនងល្អគ្រប់អតិថិជនក្នុងតំបន់ ដើម្បីងាយស្រួលក្នុងការបែងចែក និងប្រមូលថវិកា
•	សហការជាប្រចាំជាមួយក្រុមជំនួយផ្នែកលក់ រាល់ការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហានានា ដែលកើតឡើងក្នុងតំបន់
•	និងធ្វើកិច្ចការផ្សេងៗទៀតដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនតំរូវ។

Job Description:
1/ Logistics Staff

- Sourcing for all local service suppliers such as warehouse, warehousing services, trucking, transportation, logistics service providers.
- Monitor and control service quality of service providers.
- Establish, maintain and updated vendor database.
- Operation planning for new business, do workable and cost saving operation planning, build up costing for new business.
- Shipment Co-ordination/ Coordinator, Liaise to shipper, consignee, carrier, forwarder, service provider to chase for and get all necessary document/ info related to shipment and to make sure smooth operation.
-Warehousing management	
-Inventory management
-WMS system master
-Purchase Order (PO) management								
-Delivery Order (DO) management								
-Documentation management: inbound shipment, PO, DO, quotation, tally sheet, etc…								
-Coordination with other related parties to make sure all jobs are done within committed timeline								
-Establish Standard Operation Procedure (SOP), Update and maintain SOP time to time								
-Doing customs clearance, cargo loading/ unloading, on-site operation								
-Co-operating with Customer Dept to proceed clearance Customs for both import & export								
-Monitor/ carry out stuffing cargoes, finish declaration & register export vessel for export shipment								
-Pick up the cargoes and delivery to cnee site after finishing clearance customs								
-Exchange D/O for inbound shipment, deliver BL for export shipment, receiving + delivering document								
-Arrange transportation means for delivery.

2/ Senior Logistics Executive

* Responsible for the following aspects of Logistics: 
- Supply Chain: sourcing, purchasing, transport (sea/land/air), customs clearance, warehousing and distribution, or  
- Freight Forwarding: sourcing, purchasing (transport: -sea/land/air) and documentation.
Also involved in identifying and implementing initiatives to reduce wastage, develop logistics solution based on customers’ request and improved efficiency of our team, solution or operation.

	Identifying and Working closely with suppliers/vendors and customers to improve operations and reduce cost. 
	Ensuring the personal safety and safe working environment of staff. 
	Communicating needs & objectives of the company to key personnel 
	Negotiating contracts to reduce costs and achieve maximum efficiency. 
	Assist to create/maintain/improve customers’ SOP 
	Accurately calculating total supply chain costs in relation to proposed new projects/shipments. 
	Continuously obtaining/updating quotes from various Vendors and also making cost comparisons.
	Risk managements
	System update and BL production
	Payment and Collection Documentation n management

Management
	Possessing creative problem-solving and analytical skills. 
	Proven ability to ensure that products/Solutions are delivered in a good state and on time. 
	Willingness to work unusual hours.
	An ability to handle the pressures arising from having to meet deadlines and targets.
Job Requirement:
1/ Logistics Staff

Cambodia people only.
3 or 4 year experiences as Logistics Staff in forwarder or Logistics company.
- Male or Female
- Good attitude and Integrity
- Good for English language. 
- Can use computer (Word and Excel)
- Willingness to travel to province and overtime.

2/ Senior Logistics Executive

4 or 6 year experiences as Logistics Executive the same in forwarder or Logistics company. 

	Knowledge of managing returns and rejections professionally & promptly with suppliers. 
	Extensive experience in the strategic planning and transportation of products. 
	Expert Solutions SOP creator
	Experience of liaising with Carriers, Overseas companies and Overseas Colleagues for Freight Forwarding businesses
	Able to negotiating rates with local contractors/Vendors and also international companies. 
	Planning of procurement, production, inventory control, logistics and distribution. 
	Experience in Key Performances measurement and evaluation of Solutions and Personnel
	Provide assistance for RFQ preparation
	Continual updates and comparison of Carriers’ quotes and routings
	Risk  management, Ability to identify risk areas and provide information to management
Process improvement
Project management
Operational logistics management
Supply chain solutions
Warehousing& Distribution
Vendor management
Supply chain solutions
Communications - English
System & Computer literacy

Job Description:
_Manage assigned operational functions within the department.
_Responsible ensuring timely posting of daily journal entries.
_Review department operation and recommend enhancements to improve effectiveness and efficiency.
_Responsible for challenging integrity of audit detail and product to ensure compliance, accuracy and effectiveness.
_Responsible for month end closing to include posting of month end journals and reconciling balance sheet accounts.
_Support the casino controller with analysis and challenging projects.
_Maintain and supervise document procedures for all casino Accounting function performed.
_Schedule, Coordinate, and supervise weekly, monthly and quarterly procedures required by the Gaming control Board.
_Create a work environment that promote teamwork, mutual respect and employee satisfaction.
_Monitor quality standards within the department and delegation of daily work.
_Responsible for hiring, Training, and disciplining of Casino Accounting staff.
_Completed ad-hoc projects as requested by Management.
_Performs other job related duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
_ Bachelor’s Degree in Business with an emphasis in Business Administration, Finance, or Accounting and/ or equivalent work experience in an accounting field.
_ Ability to apply sound judgment, decision making and problem solving skills to effectively complete assigned functions; a pro-active word style that recognizes problems and looks beyond current practices t suggest solutions to maximize the effectiveness of processes.
_ Ability to prioritize and handle multiple word assignments while meeting deadlines.
_ Possess the ability to read, analyze and evaluate financial reports, transactions, correspondence, and written material; ability to work in a team environment; ability to effectively communicate both verbally and in writing with management and outside contacts while working under pressure and meeting deadlines.
_ Excellence customer service skills.
_ Able to lead and mentor a team.
_ Have interpersonal skills to deal effectively with all business contacts.
_ Professional appearance and demeanor. Demeanor.
_ Work varied shifts, including weekends and holidays.
_ Good working knowledge of PC computer software programs (Excel, Word, Appec and Other Accounting Software).
_ High school diploma or equivalent. 
_ Able to effectively communicate in English, in both written and oral form

Job Description:
Our client is Phnom Penh’s most prestigious commercial address. Rising to 187.3m, this landmark development is designed and constructed to the highest international standards for Cambodia’s emerging business and leisure community. Currently, we are seeking qualified candidate to fill the position Store Supervisor.
Responsibilities:
- Work in collaboration with the Company’s Sales and Field Service teams to understand the scope of projects.
- Effectively plan and communicate customer projects as it relates to new product roll outs, product resets, and markdowns for key customers; while overseeing this process for the Retail Operations Specialist team.
- Develops and implements enhanced departmental procedures to ensure continuous excellence.
- Works collaboratively with internal customers to obtain pricing and shipping information while coordinating product availability with customer needs.
- Manages the overall fixture budget for all accounts assigned to the Business Unit.
- Develop the Retail Operations Specialist team while fostering a challenging and rewarding work environment.
- Follow procedures for receiving merchandise shipments, transferring merchandise and handling defectives.
- Maintain store fund and monitor deposits in accordance with company policies. 
- Monitor supply levels, conduct inventories, and maintain inventory records.
- Other tasks assigned by Management Team

Requirements:
- Strong analytically, prioritizing, interpersonal, problem-solving & planning skills
- Experience with managing direct reports.
- Ability to work in a fast-paced corporate environment with the ability to build and maintain relationships with internal and external customers.
- Be able to speak and read good business English.
- 2 years experiences
- Bachelor Degree
- Major: Sales and Marketing

Conditions and benefits:
- Working days: Monday-Sunday
- Holidays: Legal holidays
- Salary is negotiable

+ Responsibilities:
- To prepare the weekly rotas and ensure adequate staffing of the restaurant at all times
- To supervise and assist the restaurant staff on daily basis
- To take food orders from customers 
- To maximize productivity of labor resources 
- To have excellent understanding and product knowledge 
- Conduct daily brief prior to each and every service and liaise with Chef to be aware of any special menu
- Evaluate guest feedback obtained, both internally & externally, taking relevant action on feedback point received and report to senior management 
- To be fully aware of the maintenance fault reporting procedure
- Working with other supervisor to coordinate all aspects of stock deliveries and keep accurate and up to date records 
- To assist with weekly ordering so as to ensure that stock levels are maintained and any special order for function etc. are placed in a timely manner 
- To meet and greet all customers where possible 
- To advise customers on all F&B choices and ensure the restaurant staff have similar product knowledge 
- To assist with the training of Restaurant staff including holding annual performance reviews

+ job requirement:
- Experience in managing and coaching a tea
- Be able to speak and read business English
- Experience 3 years
 At least 3 Years' Experience in Fine Dining Restaurant 
- Ability to interact positively with management and co-workers and ability to produce a high volume of work in a timely manner 

+ Conditions and Benefits:
- Working time: 8:00am-12:00am | 1:00pm-5:30pm
- Working days: Monday-Sunday
- Holidays: Legal Holidays
- Salary is negotiable

Job Description:
Our client is Phnom Penh’s most prestigious commercial address. Rising to 187.3m, this landmark development is designed and constructed to the highest international standards for Cambodia’s emerging business and leisure community. Currently, we are seeking qualified candidate to fill the position Cashier.

+ Responsibilies
- To obtain cash float at start of shift from your assigned safe box – count and verify that the fund balance – to ensure there is ample denominations.
- Prepare proper manual or computer reporting forms for the day with name, date, shift and outlet.
- Stock cashiers station with proper supplies to include credit card vouchers, credit card imprinter, wastebasket, scratch pads, pencils, pens, stapler
and staples, stamp pad, tape, matches and machine rolls.
- To input accurately all food, beverage and accessories sales onto outlet checks.
- To handle payments by credit cards in accordance with the prescribed procedures as follows:
- Should the amount exceed the limit of the credit card; you should notify the credit card company and obtain an Approval Code Number.
- Credit cards should be properly checked against the cancellation bulletins and properly inserted into the Imprinter before processing.
- Make sure that the cardholder signs the correct charge voucher.
- To understand the method of settlement thoroughly as laid down by the management from time to time and to obtain correct and accurate settlement
of all sales.
- To handle voiding, correcting, changing of restaurant or retail checks in accordance with the prescribed procedures.
- To return the cash float after shift to the safety-box assigned.
- To ensure that the quantity of (paper roll) outlet checks, house use checks and other work forms are adequate at the Cashier Counter.
- To ensure that there is adequate supply of small change in the various denominations in the Cashier’s float.
- To account for all customers’ checks – those used during the shift and those voided.
- To identify and correct any errors.

Requirements:
- Bachelor Degree
- Accounting
- 2 years
- 2 Years Luxury Retail Experience or F&B or Hotel 4-5 
- Ability to work in a fast-paced corporate environment with the ability to build and maintain relationships with internal and external customers.
- Familiar with a variety of the field's concepts, practices, and procedures.
- Be able to speak and read good english  	

+ Conditions and benefits:
- Working time: 7:00am-12:00am | 1:00pm-4:00pm
- Working days: Monday-Sunday
- Holidays: Legal holidays
- Salary is negotiable

Company Profile:
Smart Axiata Co., Ltd., Cambodia’s leading mobile telecommunications operator, currently serves 8 million subscribers under the ‘Smart’ brand. Smart Axiata is part of Axiata Group Berhad, one of Asia’s largest telecommunications groups.

Smart is at the forefront of mobile technology advancement in Cambodia. Smart was the first network to introduce 4G LTE in 2014, 4G+ in 2016 and 4G+ with HD Voice (VoLTE) in early 2017. In mid-2017, Smart introduced cutting-edge 4.5G, manifesting its data leadership position in Cambodia. Smart also provides 2G, 2.5G, 3G and 3.75G mobile services as well as international roaming across more than 190 countries. Its extensive nationwide network coverage stretches to more than 98% of the Cambodian population.

The company is also rapidly transforming itself into a digital lifestyle brand, having introduced many innovative offerings and lifestyle entertainment value propositions. This includes various international partnerships, with brands as diverse as Universal Music, Apple, Facebook and iflix, as well as digital services including SmartLuy, Smart Insurance, SmartPay, Smart Music and SmartNas. Smart aspires to become Cambodia’s Digital Champion, while playing an active role in socio-economic growth.

The company’s workforce consists of more than 1000 local and foreign experts. Smart is committed to its customers, employees and the people of Cambodia, in delivering its promise of enriching their lives through world-class networks, exceptional digital experiences and through significant corporate social responsibility engagements.
Contact Info: Contact Information Kanhaly  010202136 No464 A, Monivong Blvd, Sangkat Tonlebasac, Khan Chamkarmoan, Phnom Penh   010202136

company_name: 唯尚电力发展有限公司（Visun Development Electricity Co.,LTD.）
Company Profile:
唯尚电力发展有限公司是一家柬中合资的从事电力、电气设备贸易及电力工程建设等一系列工作的公司。公司主要的贸易产品有高压电气设备、低压电气设备、节能电气设备（太阳能）等等，是一个集工程建设、企业、民用电气设备贸易于一体的公司。
    Visun Development Electricity Co., Ltd. is a joint venture between Cambodia and China, engaged in the trading of electricity, electrical equipment and electrical engineering construction and a series of works. The company’s main trading products include high-voltage electrical equipment, low-voltage electrical equipment, energy-saving electrical equipment (solar energy), etc. is a collection of engineering construction projects, enterprises, civil electrical equipment into one set company.  

    公司拥有雄厚的电力工程建设及电气设备安装工程建设的技术力量，包括专业的设计、施工、检验、试验及商务技术力量。公司通过引进世界先进的电力专业技术和设备，服务于柬埔寨的企业和人民。公司与中国、韩国、德国等多家著名电力设备、器材生产厂商取得联系并获得在柬埔寨的总代理权，依托这些厂商强大的技术实力和资金实力，根据客户的实际需求，为用户打造良好的供电系统及用电环境。
    Company has a strong technology force of electrical engineering construction and electrical equipment installation engineering construction, including professional design, construction, inspection, testing and business technology force. The company through the import of the world advanced electrical professional technology and equipment to serve Cambodia enterprises and people. The company gets in touch with electrical equipment, equipment manufacturers in China, South Korea, Germany and many other well-known countries, and gets the right of distribution in Cambodia. Rely on these manufacturers’ strong technical strength and financial strength, according to customers' actual demand to build a good electrical supply system and electrical environment for users.

    唯尚电力力求以解决柬埔寨人民生活、生产的电力需求为己任。以自身的不断努力，使柬埔寨城乡电力供应设施得到发展和完善。        
    Visun Electricity is seeking to resolve the electricity demand in livings and productions of Cambodian people, and trusts as its own responsibility, by the continuous effort to develop and improve Cambodian urban and rural electricity supply facilities.
Contact Info: Contact Information Tea Seangphea  088 88 77 375 №. 27K, Preah Monivong Blvd, Sangkat Sras Chork, Khan Doun Penh, Phnom Penh.  088 88 77 375

job title: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន ( Credit Officer )  គ្រប់ខេត្ត-រាជធានី
position: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន ( Credit Officer )  គ្រប់ខេត្ត-រាជធានី
Location: Banteay Meanchey，Banlung，Battambang，Bavet，Kampong Cham，Kampong Chhnang，Kampong Speu，Kampong Thom，Kampot，Kandal，Kep，Koh Kong，Kratie，Mondulkiri，Oddor Meanchey，Pailin，Phnom Penh，Poipet，Preah Sihanouk，Preah Vihear，Prey Veng，Provinces，Pursat，Rattanakiri，Siem Reap，Sre Ambel，Stung Treng，Svay Rieng，Takeo，Takhmao，Tboung Khmum
Job Description:
- បញ្ចេញឥណទានជូនអតិថិជនឲ្យសម្រេចបានទៅតាមផែនការកំណត់។
- តាមដានការរីកចំរើនបរិមាណ និងគុណភាពឥណទានរបស់ខ្លួនទទួលខុសត្រូវ។
- ប្រមូលប្រាក់ពីអតិថិជនមកវិញ និងត្រួតពិនិត្យ តាមដានការសងត្រឡប់ ប្រមូលបំណុលយឺតយ៉ាវ ឬបំណុលដែលបានលុបចេញពីបញ្ចី។
- ស្រាវជ្រាវព័ត៌មានស្ថានភាពទីផ្សារ និងគូប្រគួតប្រជែងនៅក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការ។
- ធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយនៅក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការដើម្បីពង្រីកតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការ និងអតិថិជន។
Job Requirement:
- មានកំរិតវប្បធម៌យ៉ាងតិចចប់ថ្នាក់ទី១២ (ជាប់ ឬធ្លាក់បាក់ឌុប) 
- អាយុយ៉ាងតិច ១៨ឆ្នាំ
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់, ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់, សុភាពរាបសារ, មានភាពវាងវៃ, និង មានទិសដៅវែងឆ្ងាយសំរាប់អាជីព ។ 
- ជាមនុស្សរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងចូលចិត្តកិច្ចការទំនាក់ទំនង  
- មានឆន្ទះខ្ពស់ក្នុងបំរើការងារនៅតាមសហគមន៍ជនបទ 
- អាចបើកបរម៉ូតូ និងមានប័ណ្ណបើកបរ(ស្ថាប័នមានម៉ូតូសម្រាប់ផ្តល់ជូន ក្នុងការបំពេញការងារ) 
- មានចំនេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេស និងកុំព្យូទ័រខ្លះៗ។

Company Profile:
** គ្រឺះស្ថានមីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ជោគជ័យ ភីអិលស៊ី
ជាគ្រឺះស្ថានមីក្រូហិរញ្ញចត្ថុ ត្រូវបានបង្កើតឡើងនៅ ថ្ងៃទី ១៨ ខែកក្កដា ឆ្នាំ២០១៥ និងទទួលអាជ្ញា ប័ណ្ណពីធនាគារជាតិនៃកម្ពុជា លេខ... ដើម្បីប្រតិបត្តិ ការផ្តល់សេវាប្រាក់កម្ចីជូន ដល់ប្រជាពលរដ្ឋដែល ត្រូវការទុនដើម្បីបង្កើតមុខរបរថ្មី ឬពង្រីកមុខរបរ ដែលមានស្រាប់សំដៅ បង្កើនប្រាក់ចំណូល និងជួយលើកកំពស់សុខមាលភាពសង្គម។

សេវាផ្តល់ឥណទាន
ជោគជ័យ ផ្តល់សេវាប្រាក់កម្ចីដល់ប្រជាពលរដ្ឋ ដែលរស់នៅតាមជនបទ ជាលក្ខណៈ ក្រុម ឯកត្តជន និងឥណទានជំនួញខ្នាតតូចនិងមធ្យម ដែលមានរយៈពេលចាប់ពី ៦សប្តាហ៍ ដល់៦០ ខែ អាស្រ័យលើមុខរបរ និងខួបផលិតកម្មអាជីវកម្ម។

** អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ ពីសេវាប្រាក់កម្ចី
- ខ្ចី និងសងប្រាក់ដល់ផ្ទះលោកអ្នក
- អត្រាការប្រាក់កាន់តែទាបនៅពេលអតិថិជនខ្ចីប្រាក់ច្រើនវគ្ក
- កម្ចីមានច្រើនប្រភេទទៅតាមតម្រូវការ ជាពិសេសកម្ចីខ្នាត តូចដើម្បីជួយសម្រួលការលំបាកអតិថិជន
- សេវាកម្មអតិថិជនល្អដែលផ្តល់ដោយបុគ្គលលិក ជោគជ័យ
- លោកអ្នកចំណេញពេលវេលា និងថវិការច្រើននៅ ពេលប្រើប្រាស់សេវាកម្ចីរបស់គ្រឹស្ថាន
- ធ្វើឲ្យជីវភាពរបស់លោកអ្នកកាន់តែជោគជ័យ និងល្អប្រសើឡើង
- បង់សងត្រឡប់មុនកាលកំណត់ដោយមិនគិតប្រាក់ពិន័យ
- ការប្រាក់គិតទៅតាមសមតុល្យប្រាក់ដើមដែលនៅជំពាក់
- ការប្រាក់គិតត្រឹមតែ៣៦០ថ្ងៃប៉ុណ្ណោះក្នុងមួយឆ្នាំ

Job Description:
•	Supervise and participate in kitchen and dining area cleaning activities.
•	Resolve customer complaints regarding food service.
•	Inspect supplies, equipment, and work areas to ensure efficient service and conformance to standards.
•	Check inventories of food, equipment, smallware, and liquor, and report shortages to designated personnel.
•	Recommend measures for improving work procedures and worker performance to increase service quality and enhance job safety.
•	Providing employee orientation and training, and conducting supervisory activities, such as creating work schedules or organizing employee time sheets.
•	Analyze operational problems, such as theft and wastage, and establish procedures to alleviate these problems.
•	Record production, operational, and personnel data on specified forms.
•	Perform various financial activities, such as cash handling, deposit preparation, and payroll.
•	Forecast staff, equipment, and supply requirements, based on a master menu.
Evaluate new products for usefulness and suitability.
•	Compile and balance cash receipts at the end of the day or shift.
•	Conduct meetings and collaborate with other personnel for menu planning, serving arrangements, and related details.
•	Present bills and accept payments.
•	Greet and seat guests, and present menus and wine lists.
•	Develop departmental objectives, budgets, policies, procedures, and strategies.
•	Schedule parties and take reservations
Job Requirement:
•	At least 2 years’ experience in this position under fast food restaurant category
•	Ability to manage multiple tasks and work under tight deadlines.
•	Proficient in spoken and written English.
•	Computer skill: Microsoft Word, Excel & E-mail
•	Good organizational and problem-solving skills
•	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
•	Strong leadership and a good team player
•	Good knowledge of food & beverage products and food hygiene

Job Description:
Description	-Seek opportunities to extend existing business and selling
-Maximize the selling process and returns for the company
-Effectively control the investigation of and implementation of new sales projects
-Constantly strive to develop a customer service oriented approach ensuring response times to customers are continuously being reduced
-Provide a consistently high level of service to both external and internal customers. This will cover both verbal and written customer liaison regarding freight rates, service parameter, schedule information and customer enquiries and complaints. 
-Understand all client specific requirements.
-Develop and implement sales process improvements in conjunction with sales personnel
-Communicate frequently with client as required
-Identify and develop new sales markets and opportunities
-Ensure that sales Management is informed
-Initiate and implement appropriate short and long term action plans
-Other works that related to sales logistics
Job Requirement:
Job Requirements 
-Bachelor Degree in Economics/Foreign Trade/Business Administration/ or other related filed.
-Minimum 2 years of customer-fronting sales experience in freight forwarding/logistics supply chain
-Must be outgoing and easily able to build relationships at all levels
-Good command of English for communication ( Chiness knowlage is prefer
-Hard work & Agressively with the nature of work
-Strong communication and presentation skills
-Preferably to have own transportation
-Willing to travel
Company Profile:
CBG is a one stop Logistics Services provider. We offer a broad spectrum of transportation, e-commerce, warehousing and other core business services. From our headquarters in Singapore and through our Worldwide Network we provide highly adaptable, value added solutions for all your logistics needs. 
We believe that businesses are grown by nurturing relationships and so we pride ourselves on being a people centric company. Apart from our renowned logistics management capabilities, CBG offers top notch customer service with that much needed human touch; we work to ensure that each customer has a positive experience with CBG Logistics. 
We understand that the global economy demands enhanced connectivity.  And this why we have built our business around the one goal of Connecting Businesses Globally.

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. Job Description:
Our client is one of the leading MFIs in Cambodia, covering all of Cambodia's 24 provinces and cities. Currently, we are seeking for both Cambodian and Expatriate to fill the position as a Head of Risk and Compliance. 
+ Responsibilities :	

- Coordinate with the other management risk committees to ensure the operational risks related to Credit, IT, Product and Financial Risk Management are managed and reported through the respective risk committees, for which all these risk committees are responsible in their report to Board Risk Committee;
- Conducting portfolio impact studies as well as coordinating stress testing for financial and enterprise risk profile;
- Monitor the state of enterprise risk management framework, operational risk management controls and instigate any necessary corrective actions;
- Review the strategy and approach for new and emerging operational risks, report to the MRC and BRC as appropriate;
- Monitor progress of action plans; Review all operational risk and compliance incidents, provide feedback loop to reporters, and suggest the corrective action to improve the procedure in order to mitigate the recurrence of incidents;
- Escalate all issues to MRC and high or extreme issues to the BRC as appropriate;
- Review operational risk and legal and regulatory compliance reports for the MRC & BRC;
- Ensure new products, projects or business changes are approved and are introduced within a prescribed process including the appropriate management of risks;
- Review the procedure manuals and other components of the operational risk management framework;
- Monitor AMK’s operational risk profile; the external environment for emerging issues;
- Coordinate with Audit Department on risk based audit of the operational gaps and review of effectiveness of risk controls in Master Risk Registers of AMK and all the departments and functions;
- Review changes in regulations and its impact on AMK compliance and operations;
- Review Compliance framework, policies and implementation tools, procedures in reporting and report formats;
- Review and assess AMK’s compliance management process, including the adequacy of internal control environment and controls in selected areas representing significant compliance risk.


+ Requirements:

- At least Bachelor degree; preferably Economics, Finance, Accounting, Law. Higher education is an advantage
- At least 3 years-experience in risk management in Banking or MFIs or similar industry
- Knowledge of laws and regulations and MFI standards
-Knowledge of statistics, data collection, analysis, and data presentation
- PC skills, Word, Power point, and Excel (graphs, charts, formulas etc.)
- Good understanding of financial institution business including systems, reporting infrastructure and product structure/packaging, regulatory requirements, business and market dynamics, and key risk drivers
- Excellent verbal and written communication skills – ability to liaison with cross functional groups, present results to management, and create effective presentations
- Ability to multi-task and to work independently: drive for results
- Ability to adapt to different and fast-moving environments
- Ability to organize and prioritize
- Rigorous, discipline and integrity, critical (but constructive) approach, team spirit
- Excellent communication skills and ability to deal with all levels of staff
- Commercially minded, sense of humor, innovative/creative

+ Conditions and benefits:


- Working time: 8:00-17:00
- Working days: Monday-Friday
- Legal Holidays: Saturday, Sunday & Legal Holidays
- competitive salary
- performance incentive
- Khmer New Year bonus
- pension fund benefit
- full medical cost reimbursement for employee, spouse, and dependent
- Insurance
- Working conditions are complied with Cambodian labor law.
- Salary : $1300 ~ up

job title: 1044_Sea Freight & Air Freight Logistic Sales Manager
position: 1044_Sea Freight & Air Freight Logistic Sales Manager
Job Description:
Our client is a young company with a long history - in 2010 We grew out of a local logistics company founded in the early 1980’s. Under the same experienced management, We aims to offer more customized and specialized services to their customers around the world.

With our roots in the emerging markets, We brings efficiency to supply chains in some of the worlds most challenging environments, offering overall personal service and customized capabilities in developed countries and emerging economies.
Our vision: to be a new type of personalized logistic company meeting the global trade challenges of tomorrow
Our mission: to provide trade through sustainable logistic solutions as a one-stop service partner
Our values: high standard, personal ownership, teamwork and excellent service. So we are hiring Sea Freight & Air Freight Logistic Sales Manager

+ Responsibilities :	

• Responsible for generating the sales revenues from air Freight and sea freight service.
• Establish sales objective and develop annual sales plan
• Initiate market study to penetrate new customer for business expansion
• Responsible for sales management including : air transport , Ocean transport, domestic transport, logistic service ( warehouse/ distribution)
• Responsible for projecting the expected sales volume and profit for existing and new client.
• Deal with internal/external business group, relevant agents, airline, sea liner, for latest update for coordinating the pricing, issuing quotation to customer.
• Develop comprehensive pricing strategies for service contracts to enhance to closure of business deals.
• Responsible and follow up sales inquiries with internal/ external customers to obtain the latest business information.
• Responsible for building good business relationship with existing and new client by conducting sales call, visit and meeting.
• Identify, Position and expand opportunities for domestic and international freight service
• Overlook the sales and marketing activities for create strong brand awareness in the market
• Contact customer when service issue may effect delivery commitment and understanding customer’s need in order to recommend appropriate solution.
• Cooperate between customer and operation team in case of mis- handing happens
• Follow up and chase for the outstanding in cases customer is having financial issue.
• Act as the receive party for customer’s complaint, investigating and coordinating with the relevant party / operation to resolve issue.
• Pacify the customer whenever there is a service difficulty, such as in case of the cargo delay and changing of the schedules.
• Work closely with other department to support smooth business operation.
• Others responsible as assignment by Management team.

+ Requirements:

• Cambodia nationality, Bachelor or Master in Logistic, Sales, Business admin or related.

Company Profile:
Prudential (Cambodia) Life Assurance PLC began operations in Cambodia in January 2013. It is the leading life insurer in Cambodia with more than USD280 million assured and 27,000 policies issued (as at 31 September 2015). One of the first life insurers in Cambodia, Prudential Cambodia is committed to raising the awareness of life insurance among the Cambodian people and helping them protect and secure their financial futures.

Prudential Cambodia is part of UK-based Prudential plc. Founded in 1848, Prudential plc is an international financial services group with significant operations in Asia, the US and the UK. It serves around 25 million insurance customers and have £505 billion of assets under management (as at 30 June 2015). Prudential plc is listed on the stock exchanges in London, Hong Kong, Singapore and New York.

Prudential plc is not affiliated in any manner with Prudential Financial, Inc., a company whose principal place of business is in the United States of America.

Job Description:
- 认真完成公司的派车任务要求；
- 负责公司车辆的验车、保养、维修等工作；
- 进行车辆内外部的日常清洁。

- Conscientiously complete company's dispatching task requirements；
- Be responsible for company vehicle’s inspection, maintenance, repair work etc.
- Daily clean external and internal parts of vehicle.
Job Requirement:
- 男性，须有驾驶执照，会中文日常沟通会话者优先；
- 三年以上驾驶经验，懂汽车维修，熟悉路况，驾驶技术熟练；
- 熟悉车辆年检、保险、养路费办理等程序；
- 形象气质佳，身体健康，工作认真负责，服从安排，吃苦耐劳、踏实责任心强、为人诚实、服务意识强，工作积极主动。

- Male, must have driving license, can use Chinese for daily communication will be preferred;
- More than three years of driving experience, Know about car repair, be familiar with the road, be proficient in driving. 
- Be familiar with handling procedures of vehicle's inspection, insurance, road tax etc. 
- The image of good temperament, good health, serious and responsible, obey the arrangement, diligent, steadfast and strong sense of responsibility, honest, strong sense of service, work actively.
Company Profile:
唯尚电力发展有限公司是一家柬中合资的从事电力、电气设备贸易及电力工程建设等一系列工作的公司。公司主要的贸易产品有高压电气设备、低压电气设备、节能电气设备（太阳能）等等，是一个集工程建设、企业、民用电气设备贸易于一体的公司。
    Visun Development Electricity Co., Ltd. is a joint venture between Cambodia and China, engaged in the trading of electricity, electrical equipment and electrical engineering construction and a series of works. The company’s main trading products include high-voltage electrical equipment, low-voltage electrical equipment, energy-saving electrical equipment (solar energy), etc. is a collection of engineering construction projects, enterprises, civil electrical equipment into one set company.  

    公司拥有雄厚的电力工程建设及电气设备安装工程建设的技术力量，包括专业的设计、施工、检验、试验及商务技术力量。公司通过引进世界先进的电力专业技术和设备，服务于柬埔寨的企业和人民。公司与中国、韩国、德国等多家著名电力设备、器材生产厂商取得联系并获得在柬埔寨的总代理权，依托这些厂商强大的技术实力和资金实力，根据客户的实际需求，为用户打造良好的供电系统及用电环境。
    Company has a strong technology force of electrical engineering construction and electrical equipment installation engineering construction, including professional design, construction, inspection, testing and business technology force. The company through the import of the world advanced electrical professional technology and equipment to serve Cambodia enterprises and people. The company gets in touch with electrical equipment, equipment manufacturers in China, South Korea, Germany and many other well-known countries, and gets the right of distribution in Cambodia. Rely on these manufacturers’ strong technical strength and financial strength, according to customers' actual demand to build a good electrical supply system and electrical environment for users.

    唯尚电力力求以解决柬埔寨人民生活、生产的电力需求为己任。以自身的不断努力，使柬埔寨城乡电力供应设施得到发展和完善。        
    Visun Electricity is seeking to resolve the electricity demand in livings and productions of Cambodian people, and trusts as its own responsibility, by the continuous effort to develop and improve Cambodian urban and rural electricity supply facilities.
Contact Info: Contact Information Tea Seangphea  088 88 77 375 №. 27K, Preah Monivong Blvd, Sangkat Sras Chork, Khan Doun Penh, Phnom Penh.  088 88 77 375

Job Description:
Our company is on the stage of Start-Up so we have to complete works with a limited time and manpower. Under the circumstances, you need to work and help the CEO time-and-cost effectively, without the limitation of the work scope, under the trust given by him. You must read his demands or needs and act in a positive manner. It will definitely be a worthy career that you work with us. The CEO is early thirty so you can communicate with him friendly and frankly. 

SPECIFIC DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
 1. Answering phone calls and emails to the company or CEO 
2. Attend a meeting with or instead of CEO 
3. Translating and Interpreting from Khmer to English 
4. Supervise local staffs 
5. Handle and conduct general affairs Etc
Job Requirement:
MINIMUM REQUIREMENT 
1. Business Level English 
2. Strong interest in Japanese culture 
 3. High ethical standards PREFERRABLE 

ABILITIES AND SKILLS 
1. MS OFFICE (WORD, EXCEL, POWERPOINT plus ACCESS) 
2. Japanese language 
3. Good appearance SALARY USD200 to USD300 per month including tax plus transportation fee WORKING DAYS AND HOUR Monday to Friday plus Saturday until noon
Company Profile:
Now is the fifth year after our CEO engaged in the real estate business in Cambodia. He worked as General Manager of Espacio (Cambodia) Co.,Ltd from Japan and at the same time as a member of executive member of "CVEA" which is Cambodian real estate association as well as local representative companies to realize the fair translation in real estate market. He is proud of the number of transactions in Cambodia as a Japanese representative company in this field as well as his position as the first agent from Japan in Cambodian real estate field.

We analyze the real estate market by our own means logically and provide the real estate agency work and property management. We do many kind of business bases on real estate keyword, and we experienced many transactions in both commercial and residential, and also sell and buy of the condominiums. We also have our own condominiums. We also can provide consulting services from the phase when clients are thinking to expand their business to Cambodia. We corporate with a legal consultant who has enough experience so they can consult with us and make a decision precisely. 

We have HOP-STEP-and-JUMP career path for your promotion. 
1st year salary as property agent: USD200 ++++
2nd year salary as sales manager: USD350 ++++
3rd year salary as general manager or senior sales manager: USD450 ++++

for admin
1st year salary as “assistant secretary”: USD250 +++
2nd year salary as “secretary”: USD350 +++
3rd year salary as “senior secretary”: USD450 +++

Our office is located in the building B-Ray Tower on the Norodom Blvd. where we can view the AEON MALL Phnom Penh and Boeung Keng Kang 1 Area.

We are waiting for you visiting us.

Job Description:
Our client is micro finance was granted its license on 23rd April 2009 by the National Bank of Cambodia, and became the first financial institution specialized in housing finance in Cambodia.  The company is focused on providing a long-term Home Loan and medium-term Home Improvement Loans to underserved low-middle income Cambodian households who do not have access to formal commercial lending.  Geographically, we are currently operating in Phnom Penh city, Siem Reap and Battambang Province; however we have plans to expand to additional provinces in the next few years.Now we are hiring Team Leaders [(Credit Officer)In Siem Reap Province].
+ Responsibilities :
- Lead credit officer’s team to achieve their targets as the team’s target
- Coach and train the team member on product knowledge and credit assessment skill
- Develop partnership with non-profit organizations, local authorities, and property developers to achieve company’s social goal
- Ensure all credit applications/credit proposals submitted for approval are completed properly
- Build and maintain good relationship with borrowing customers
- Assist time to time on reports and statistics, i.e: Market survey of product trend
- Perform other tasks that might be assigned by line manager

+ Requirements:
- Work experience as Senior Credit Officer or Sale/Marketing representative
- Strong sales and marketing as well as analytic skills
- Willing to travel for site and customer visits

+ Conditions and benefits:
- Salary: $ 300 - $ 400
- Working Day: Monday - Friday
- Working time: 8:00 am- 12:00 am | 1:00 pm-5:00 pm
- Holiday: Sat (Half) / Sat (Full) / Sun / Legal holiday
- Provident Fund
- 13 Month Salary
- Bonus 
- Insurance Heath and accident

company_name: 唯尚电力发展有限公司（Visun Development Electricity Co.,LTD.）
Company Profile:
唯尚电力发展有限公司是一家柬中合资的从事电力、电气设备贸易及电力工程建设等一系列工作的公司。公司主要的贸易产品有高压电气设备、低压电气设备、节能电气设备（太阳能）等等，是一个集工程建设、企业、民用电气设备贸易于一体的公司。
    Visun Development Electricity Co., Ltd. is a joint venture between Cambodia and China, engaged in the trading of electricity, electrical equipment and electrical engineering construction and a series of works. The company’s main trading products include high-voltage electrical equipment, low-voltage electrical equipment, energy-saving electrical equipment (solar energy), etc. is a collection of engineering construction projects, enterprises, civil electrical equipment into one set company.  

    公司拥有雄厚的电力工程建设及电气设备安装工程建设的技术力量，包括专业的设计、施工、检验、试验及商务技术力量。公司通过引进世界先进的电力专业技术和设备，服务于柬埔寨的企业和人民。公司与中国、韩国、德国等多家著名电力设备、器材生产厂商取得联系并获得在柬埔寨的总代理权，依托这些厂商强大的技术实力和资金实力，根据客户的实际需求，为用户打造良好的供电系统及用电环境。
    Company has a strong technology force of electrical engineering construction and electrical equipment installation engineering construction, including professional design, construction, inspection, testing and business technology force. The company through the import of the world advanced electrical professional technology and equipment to serve Cambodia enterprises and people. The company gets in touch with electrical equipment, equipment manufacturers in China, South Korea, Germany and many other well-known countries, and gets the right of distribution in Cambodia. Rely on these manufacturers’ strong technical strength and financial strength, according to customers' actual demand to build a good electrical supply system and electrical environment for users.

    唯尚电力力求以解决柬埔寨人民生活、生产的电力需求为己任。以自身的不断努力，使柬埔寨城乡电力供应设施得到发展和完善。        
    Visun Electricity is seeking to resolve the electricity demand in livings and productions of Cambodian people, and trusts as its own responsibility, by the continuous effort to develop and improve Cambodian urban and rural electricity supply facilities.
Contact Info: Contact Information Tea Seangphea  088 88 77 375 №. 27K, Preah Monivong Blvd, Sangkat Sras Chork, Khan Doun Penh, Phnom Penh.  088 88 77 375

•Pleasing personality and a strong sensitivity to the needs of patients. 
•Good inter-personal communication skills.
•Willing to travel in the field, if required. 
•Willing to work flexible hours.

Company Profile:
As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment Team  017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555 No. 33 Preah Sihanouk Blvd., Phnom Penh  017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555
