Job Description:
COMPANY PROFILE


Sky (Cambodia) Travel specializes in in-bound tours such as vacations,  tours, hotel reservations, guided tours and air ticketing and Its established in 2002 the company designs and arranges a wide variety of group and customized tours. Our tourism License 

no.388, Ministry of Commerce no. 0924  . 


Over the years, Sky (Cambodia) Travel has been successfully offering travelers of all ages and backgrounds the opportunity to travel with ease, comfort and security to places they would often not feel comfortable visiting on their own and has grown to become one of Cambodia’s leading tour operators and destination management companies. The company now has tours guide’s license from Ministry of tourism and qualified individuals to take charge of operations in capital Phnom Penh and the marvelous province of Siem Reap (Home of the magnificent Angkor Wat).


These efforts propelled the company to expanded partner beyond to Thailand, Vietnam, Laos, Myanmar, and Malaysia... as well. In this connection, Sky (Cambodia) Travel is particularly selective of their partners and affiliates the company works with in those destinations and makes doubly sure that they are just as committed to provide impeccable services like they do.


Sky (Cambodia) Travel encapsulates a carefree yet organized approach in its operations and has come to be known for the high quality and level of professionalism it provides in their services. All customers are treated as guests and their staff members are passionate about guest comfort and satisfaction. In turn, their guests appreciate their attention to details and the value that each of their escorted vacations offers. This has been positively reflected in a recent customer satisfaction survey conducted by the company. 

 Continuous efforts are constantly in place to provide better services and creating new holiday itineraries to satisfy growing demands especially those of their regular guests.


The different types of programs Sky (Cambodia) Travel packages include classic tours, cultural and educational tours, and soft adventure and eco-adventure tours. Other special programs such as meetings and incentive vacations, honey moon, and golf packages are also very popular items. The company also organizes customized tours for those who desire unique vacations with specifics in their holiday plans and this sort of vacation is fast becoming a trend.


In addition, Sky (Cambodia) Travel offers other facilities such as cars and buses rental and hotel reservations, multilingual guide services, visa arrangements and many other travel related services. it also operates the popular sunset boat excursions which operations meet International Safety Standards and is approved and licensed by the department of transportation here in Cambodia. 



Sky (Cambodia) Travel   best service and full arrange of travel needs
Job Requirement:
- Welcome Passengers 
- Check flight and booking air ticket 
- Issue air ticket and responsible to (  fare, name, contact details….ect ) 
- Contact private company and  passengers to use service 
 - Make quotation to passengers by phone , Email…ect. 
- Resolve all customer enquirers and complaints in a timely which happening with service. 
- Service recovery - satisfying guest with professional and empathetic service 
- Manage individual performance and able to generate own performance report 
- Always keep abreast on company's operational issues and the airline industry trends 
- Able to work independently, honestly with responsibilities 
- Able to work with team
- Work under pressure 
Only Short listed candidates will appointment  for interviewing , No phone call, Send your CV to e-mail skytravelcambodia01@gmail.com

Job Description:
-	បញ្ចេញសាច់ប្រាក់ និងទទួលសាច់ប្រាក់ពីអតិថិជនក៍ដូចជាភ្នាក់ងារឥណទាន
-	រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចំាខែជូនថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ
-	ថែរក្សា ទុកដាក់សាច់ប្រាក់ និងលិខិតស្នាមទាំងឡាយ អោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវតាមលក្ខណះបច្ចេកទេស និងសេចក្តីណែនំា
-	បិទបញ្ជីសាច់ប្រាក់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ដោយធ្វើការត្រួតពិនិត្យនូវសាច់ប្រាក់ជាក់ស្ដែង ធៀបនិងបញ្ជីរៀងរាល់ចុងថ្ងៃធ្វើការនៃថ្ងៃនីមួយៗ ករណីមានបញ្ហាលើសរឺខ្វះសាច់ប្រាក់ ត្រូវរាយការណ៍មកថ្នាក់មានសម្ថកិច្ច រឺអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់

អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ដែលទទួលបានៈ

- ទទួលបានប្រាក់បៀវត្សចំនួន ១២០ ដុល្លារអាមេរិកក្នុងមួយ ខែក្នុងការសាកល្បង
- ចប់ការសាកល្បងទទួលបានប្រាក់បៀវត្សចំនួន ១៦០ ដុល្លារអាមេរិកក្នុងមួយខែ
- ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភសំរាប់បុណ្យចូលឆ្នាំខ្មែរប្រពៃណីជាតិ និងបុណ្យភ្ជុំបិណ្យ ១០០% លើប្រាក់បៀវត្សមូលដ្ឋាន
- ឧបត្ថម្ភសំលៀកបំពាក់ ៦០ដុល្លារក្នុងមួយឆ្នាំ
Job Requirement:
- មានអាយុចាប់ពី ២០ ឆ្នាំ ទៅ ៣០ ឆ្នាំ 
- កំពុងសិក្សាថ្នាក់សញ្ញាប័ត្រចាប់ពីឆ្នាំទី០១ឡើងទៅ 
ឬក៏មានសញ្ញាប័ត្រទុតិយភូមិ

តាមតំបន់គោលដៅឆ្ងាយៗបាន
- មានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការបំពេញការងារនៅតាមមូលដ្ឋាន និងមានការទទួល
ខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់លើការនិងតួនាទីរបស់ខ្លួន
- ត្រូវចេះប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ Ms Word, Ms Excel
- ភាសាអង៉គ្លេសអាចប្រើការបាន

- សូមភ្ជាប់មកនូវជាមួយនិង CV និង Cover letter ។
-​ ច្បាប់ថតចំលងអត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ ០១ ច្បាប់

- ច្បាប់ថតចំលងវិញ្ញាបនប័ត្រសិក្សាវគ្គខ្លីៗ និងឯកសារផ្សេងៗ

Job Description:
-Plan and deliver education programmes for the holistic development of the children
-Support the development and implementation of teaching and learning approaches and resources, as well as best practices to enhance the learning experiences for the children
-Prepare learning materials and conduct age-appropriate programmes
-Provide a positive learning environment and ensure the well-being and safety of the children
-Engage parents and partners in education to be involved in learning and development of the childre
-Monitor and document children's learning and development
Job Requirement:
-Qualification must be degree holder (but not necessary to have educational degree)
-Have to be skilled in teaching, time management, stress management, supervisory and decision making. Thus, it is crucial for applicants to be highly effective in verbal and listening skills.
-Teaching possess effective communication skills and the ability to engage the children
-Nurturing and dedicated to the development and well-being of children
-Be able to work under pressure
-Fluent in English Language
-Passion for working with children

Salary: 1000$/month
Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Bun Sros  017209333 No.36, St.169, PPIU Building, 4th Floor, Veal Vong, 7 Makara, Phnom Penh, Cambodia   017209333

Job Description:
SUMMARY OF POSITION
Our client is a proud provider of quality early learning and care for children and families in the communities it serves. 
The Kindergarten Teacher and GEP Teacher will be responsible for the early Childhood Education skills and the early Childhood Educator Assistant skills.

MAIN DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
Kindergarten Teacher
- Attend to children's basic needs by feeding them, dressing them, and changing their diapers (sometimes),
- Teach basic skills such as basic Maths, colors, shapes, numbers and letter recognition, personal hygiene, and social skills,
- Read books to entire classes or to small groups,
- Organize and lead activities designed to promote physical, mental and social development, such as games, arts and crafts, music, storytelling, and field trips,
- Prepare materials and classrooms for class activities,
- Plan and supervise class projects, field trips, visits by guests, or other experiential activities, and guide students in learning from those activities,
- Adapt teaching methods and instructional materials to meet students' varying needs and interests,
- Prepare reports on students and activities as required by Academic Supervisors,
- Attend staff meetings, and serve on committees as required,
- Work closely with Teacher Assistant.
GEP Teacher
- Teach English subject to children (age 7-18),
- Prepare lesson plans, homework and test, 
- Assess and evaluate student knowledge,
- Incorporate technology into teaching,
- Provide a safe and warm learning environment,
- Build student’s self-esteem and good character,
- Provide extra support to weak students,
- Report student progress to parents (i.e. Parent Teacher Conference).

* Reporting
- To the School Principal & Board of Directors.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree,
- Need patience and understanding in their daily jobs,
- Need to understand how to select developmentally appropriate materials and equipment and work cooperatively with parents to develop education plans,
- Must know how to use assessment tools, enforce rules and communicate effectively with young children,
- Need to know how to use and incorporate technology into the classroom,
- Teach English subject to children (age 7-18),
- Prepare lesson plans, homework and test,
- Assess and evaluate student knowledge,
- Incorporate technology into teaching,
- Provide a safe and warm learning environment,
- Build student’s self-esteem and good character,
- Provide extra support to weak students,
- Report student progress to parents (i.e. Parent Teacher Conference).

Job Description:
Our business partner is the Medical factory. Currently, we are seeking for the potential candidate to fulfill the position QA Manager.


+ Responsibilities :
- Accomplishes quality assurance human resource objectives by recruiting, selecting, orienting, training, assigning, scheduling, coaching, counseling, and disciplining employees; communicating job expectations; planning, monitoring, appraising, and reviewing job contributions; planning and reviewing compensation actions; enforcing policies and procedures.
- Achieves quality assurance operational objectives by contributing information and analysis to strategic plans and reviews; preparing and completing action plans; implementing production, productivity, quality, and customer-service standards; identifying and resolving problems; completing audits; determining system improvements; implementing change.
- Meets quality assurance financial objectives by estimating requirements; preparing an annual budget; scheduling expenditures; analyzing variances; initiating corrective actions.
- Develops quality assurance plans by conducting hazard analyses; identifying critical control points and preventive measures; establishing critical limits, monitoring procedures, corrective actions, and verification procedures; monitoring inventories.
- Other task assign by GM

+ Requirements:
- 5 years experiences as QA Manager
- All nationality excepted Philippine 
- Perform inspection to meet client’s standard and requirement.
- Know well about SOP, production and quality standard of all departments.
- Ability to work independently and ability to work in team
- Excellent interpersonal and communication skill
- Good attitude and integrity
- Good in spoken and written English (Chinese is preferable)
- Computer literacy (Word, Excel, Internet and E-mail etc...)

Job Description: #NAME?
Job Requirement: #NAME?
Company Profile:
As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment Team  017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555 No. 33 Preah Sihanouk Blvd., Phnom Penh  017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555

Job Description:
• Ensure that all civil activities within the designated areas are well planned, coordinated and be able to utilize all available resources in coordination with other functional Managers in directing and supervising all involved site personnel and subcontractors
• Leads and ensure all work groups are properly guided, in close cooperation with the Project Manager, in assembling and controlling the required resources (manpower, equipment, materials and tools required)to start and sustain the work efficiency and productivity until the completion of the project
• Inspects work in progress to ensure conformity with QA/Q C specifications and requirements, Industry Codes, Standards and Procedures, and provides technical advices to resolve problems
• Advises the Project Manager in determining and procurement of tools and materials to be delivered at specific times in order to conform to the workloads, plans and schedules
• Interact with other construction areas and Superintendent, discusses and reviews with Project Manager the project Key Performance Indicators to determine accurate status of the project, making tactical decisions for allocating resources, and assigning staff requirements, to maintain project on target
• Review reports from Superintendents, and forwards to Project Manager for corrective actions if project becomes behind schedule or over the budget
• Performs department on‐boarding and induction relevant to procedures, guidelines, policies, etc. 
• Complies with the highest level of health, safety and zero accident during all stages of project execution and pro‐active with safety groups and subcontractors to promote safe and hazardous free work within the designated area
• Support and assist staff with skills training programs (if requires), with the aim of increasing worker skills and personnel development
Job Requirement:
• Graduate of Civil Engineering from a reputable college or university
• With minimum 10 years significant Industrial, commercial, residential construction experience, with at least 5 years as Construction Manager.
• With competence in Construction Management skills, motivated, has strong leadership, able to encourage subordinates and other work groups to work as a team.
• With understanding of other disciplines like Electrical, Mechanical, Piping, Instrumentation, Electronics & Communication from site activities point of view.   
• Possess negotiation and influence skills, innovative, creative thinker, flexible and excellent organizer.
• Has excellent oral & written communication in English and interpersonal skills.

• Find potential clients to get the loan products and services in their geographic areas or boundaries.

- 5% of your time it is updating JIRA and company wiki.

Job Description:
- Be part of Executive Management in strategy development and implementation process,
- Lead IT strategy and operational processes in a way that they align with HRINC’s business strategy to achieve overall HRINC’s goal by fostering innovation,
- Analyze the technology infrastructure and its alignment with business strategy.
- Develop and maintain appropriate IT structures to ensure a sustainable response to current and future business needs,
- Seek, evaluate and implement appropriate and cost effective investments in IT resources such as staffing, outsourcing, in-house development and purchasing,
- Ongoing Risk assessment and course correction on current and future IT systems and infrastructure,
- Develop, monitor and evaluate annual capital and operating budgets to ensure they are in line with HRINC’s business strategy,
- Assess and make suggestion on improvement or re-engineering of IT policies, process, infrastructure, security and other aspects of the IT infrastructure, hardware and software.
- Monitor, support and develop both internal IT resources as well as any external resources.
- Review hardware and software purchase and maintenance contracts and recommend the best options for approval.
- Establish or review IT policies and procedure including but not limited to Service level agreements with end users,
- Key Risk Indicators of each IT system in use,
- Business continuity planning,
- Recovery time objective,
- System security.
- Review and Monitor whole IT system and performance,
- Supervise recruitment, retention and development of staff to meet HRINC’s current and future needs.
Job Requirement:
- At least Bachelor’s Degree in computer science or Business administration or an equivalent qualification. Master degree in any of these fields is preferred.
- At least 7 years at a management level,
- Experience in strategic planning and execution,
- Ability to apply IT solutions to business challenges in a cost effective manner,
- Excellent in written and oral communication,
- Honesty, excellent interpersonal skill, strong negotiation skill and attention to detail,
- Strong ability to present idea in business friendly and user friendly language,
- Meticulous approach to analysis, evaluation and problem solving,
- Ability to motivate and create a collaborate environment,
- Ability to construct business models and write business plans with financial projections.
- Both Cambodian and Expatriate are encourage to apply

Job Description:

To support the Area Development Programs (ADPs) within their operation with the coordination and production of all communication collateral; video & photography, graphic design & print, writing, events, media, and support the Creative Youth Transformation Development Facilitators  (TDFs) with the implementation of the Creative Youth Curriculum. Job Description:
I. THE PURPOSE OF THE POSITION
To provide day-to-day financial assistance to Finance Officer; this position is primarily accountable for sun system data encoding, producing timely financial reports, ensuring the correctness and accuracy of supporting documents attached with card forms for project/units under his/her supervision.  Also, s/he is responsible for parts of cashiering and filing function to keep good track of all accounting records and related financial matters.

II. MAJOR RESPONSIBILITIES

- Daily issues cash to cashier, conduct cash count, review working cash, prepare vault cash sheet and monitor cash inflow & outflow to ensure the security of banking and cash on hand hold in office.
- Maintains accounting records for all vouchers to certify the correctness of daily cash reconciliation.
- Process daily financial transactions (card forms) prior to the payment to ensure sufficient supporting documents attached and compliance with stewardship manual and other policies/guidelines.
- Follow up to clear outstanding reconcile items (170,180,190,200…etc.) for preparing correct aging reports and recording expense within the month of transactions occurred.
- Assist Finance Officer to prepare project and donor financial reports for various support offices on a monthly and quarterly basis such as Log frame report, Project core financial report, and Donor requirement report.
- Responds to request from project regarding financial data and advice.
- Assist finance officer to conduct spot check with beneficiaries/vendors to ensure reality and transparency of supporting documents.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in Accounting or Finance
- Sound technical knowledge in accounting system, policies and procedures.
- Proven knowledge of an accounting software, esp. Sun system.
- Knowledge of basic computer (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
- Good English for communication purpose (writing, speaking, listening)
- Good interpersonal skill, well organized and priories work
- At least One-year experiences in accounting working.

Job Description:
I. THE PURPOSE OF THE POSITION
- To provide overall leadership and management for the area development program in accordance with relevant World Vision strategies (e.g. National and Secondary), policies (e.g. Transformational Development, Child Sponsorship) and frameworks (e.g. Learning through Evaluation with Accountability and Planning (LEAP))
- To effectively represent and model World Vision’s mission, vision, core values and identity through good relationships and networks with relevant internal and external stakeholders, including staff, community groups, local church, local leaders, government departments and other NGOs.

II. MAJOR RESPONSIBILITIES
1. Manage and support the Area Development Program (ADP) staff to ensure good individual and team performance in support of quality ministry and good stewardship, Facilitate effective teamwork, coordination and work planning between Transformational Development Facilitators (TDFs) and Project Coordinators in support of ministry objectives.
2. Ensure that program and projects comply at all stages with World Vision International (WVI) standards for Design, Monitoring and Evaluation, as specified in the LEAP framework and associated guidelines Ensure that project priorities are based on community needs and reflect WV Cambodia’s three strategic themes: vulnerable children; empowered communities and transformed systems and structures.
3. Ensure gender balance, Christian commitment, and child protections are integrated into planning and implementation of projects.
4. Ensure monitoring system and tools are developed and used by Project Coordinators (PCs) & Transformational Development Facilitators (TDFs) to track the progress of project implementation, and to capture learning. Coordinate processes for Area Development Program (ADP) evaluation and Transformational Development Indicator (TDI) measurement
5. Ensure compliance with sponsorship standards and integration of child sponsorship with development programming in accordance with Sponsorship and Transformational Development (TD) Policies, and sponsorship programming guidelines
6. Coordinate with all staff and partners (especially Community-Based Organizations (CBOs)) to ensure and support project implementation that promotes sustainable, child-focused transformational development
Job Requirement:
- Fully able to embrace organizational values and possess a high level of commitment towards the mission of WVC.
- Bachelor of Business Management or Rural Development.
- Minimum 2 years of appropriate professional experience in management and leadership of a comparable community development program/project.
- Experience in project and program design, implementation, monitoring, evaluation, and report writing.
- Previous experience in advocacy and networking.
- Christian commitment and maturity is an advantage.
- Competent in written English communication and Computer literate; Microsoft Word and Excel.
- Willingness to travel and stay overnight at project sites, sometimes in remote areas

job title: Operations Technical Officer for Education $USD 600 to 750
position: Operations Technical Officer for Education $USD 600 to 750
Job Description:
To provide technical support to ADPs on the assessment, design, monitoring, implementation and evaluation of Education Projects in ADPs, in partnership with the NO Education and other technical teams; build the capacity of Education Project Coordinators and represent WVC to external education stakeholders at the provincial level towards quality education programming and improvements in education outcomes.
II. MAJOR RESPONSIBILITIES

A. Technical support is given to ADPs on program and project assessment, design, baseline, monitoring, implementation and evaluation of education projects.
1. Participate in program assessment, education project design processes, baseline and evaluation of education projects.
2. Provide technical assistance to ADPs and other technical teams on data to be collected, tools to be used in data gathering and analysis at program assessment, project design, baseline, monitoring and evaluation of education projects.
3. Ensure that the Education M and E framework and system (indicators, tools, processes, analysis, aggregation, etc) is used. 
B. Build the capacity of ADP of Education Project coordinators and other field staff.
1. In close collaboration with the NO Education Technical Team, co-lead and co-facilitate Education PC Networks.
2. Provide on- site technical coaching, mentoring and training support to Project Coordinators on any aspect of education programming including adoption of common standards and tools and input on innovative practices.
3. Collaborate regularly with Operations Monitoring Officers, Zonal DME Officers and other Operations Technical Officers on matters of technical support to ADPs for all LEAP processes and products.
C. Represent WVC to external education stakeholders so that WVC becomes a partner of choice in education of multi-sector groups in society (government, other civil society groups and the private sector).
1. Establish strong relations and collaboration with Provincial Education NGO Network, Provincial Education Sector Working Group, Provincial Education Congress and with the POEYS.
2. Engage the Operations Manager and together represent WVC in education sector at provincial level.

To established/strengthened community-based care and child protection mechanism to provide quality services, care and protection to child victims. To strengthen community referral system for child victims who need alternative care and legal services

II. MAJOR RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Coordinate with Operational District (OD) officers and the Operation (or Program) Health Coordinator and if necessary with National Health Program and the ADP (Area Development Program) partners in designing, implementing, monitoring and evaluation the health activities of ADP.

I. THE PURPOSE OF THE POSITION
The position was established to oversee the Operations Technical Support Teams (OTSTs), including Finance Officer, Administration Officer, Communications Coordinator, Operational Technical Officer (OTO) for Health, OTO for Education, Operational Monitoring Officer (OMO), and CCC, at the provincial level. The Operations Technical Team Leader ensures that the OTSTs provide services to (4-7) Area Development Programs (ADPs) with quality and in alignment with guideline and policies. 

II. MAJOR RESPONSIBILITIES
1. To accountably assure that Finance and Admin teams and Communications Officer provide their respective services to ADPs with quality, in a timely manner and in alignment with relevant guidelines and policies.
2. To provide support to Operations Technical Support Teams including OTO Health, OTO Education, and OMO to ensure Learn through Evaluation Accountability Programs (LEAP) compliance and satisfactory function of church partnership.
3. To support Operations Manager in strengthening relationships with partners at provincial level.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor in Business Administration or urban/rural community development
- Minimum of 4 years in leadership and management of multi-sectored community-based development programming
- Sound experience in project and program design, implementation, monitoring, evaluation and report writing
- Proven ability to manage, motivate and build capacity of staff
- Able to communicate very well in English both verbal and written   
- Fully able to embrace organizational values and possess a high level of commitment towards the mission of WVC.
Company Profile: As member of the World Vision International Partnership, World Vision Cambodia (WVC) is a Christian relief and development organization committed to Working with poor communities, focused on children, to transform lives and Cambodian society through Sustainable development.

- Perform regular/routine checks on all systems and services to ensure their reliability.

Our core offering consists of Mobile Strategy definition, User interface and Interaction design, Custom app and Game development, Custom web development, Backend integration, Middleware and Content Management and App distribution.

Job Description:
Our fast growing international company is hiring immediately 5 talented senior web developers with 2+ years of experience to join our hard-working staff of professionals who love their job and enjoy working together as a team. We pay above market salary. 

Pathmazing is a global software solution provider in pursuit of extraordinary mobile application and web solutions. We are the developers of FanNow, the first movie ticket and deal purchase app in Cambodia. Our hard-working team of nearly 40 IT professionals reside in offices located in the United States, Malaysia and Cambodia -- serving clients worldwide around the clock. Our Cambodian office is located on the top floor of the Bayon Center with a beautiful view of the city skyline, including Canadia Tower and Vattanac Tower.
Job Requirement:
- Open source development experience
- Specific technical skills are PHP, Javascript, CSS, MySQL
- PHP framework (Laravel, CodeIgniter) and service configuration experiences are a big plus
- Web services, responsive design and parallax scrolling experience are a plus.  
- Good oral and written English communications. 
- Willing to have fun and join company events such as Online Game Day (StarCraft, WarCraft) at our office every Sunday. 

For consideration, please send your CV to jobs@pathmazing.com. Benefits include generous salary, profit sharing and potential ownership in the company.
Company Profile:
Join Pathmazing today — Cambodia's #1 IT outsourcing firm. 

Cambodia's leading software solutions provider is seeking business development managers, project managers and business analysts to join our world-class team. With over 130 IT talents working on exciting international projects, Pathmazing is providing solutions to clients globally, and deploying our own commercial apps. International clients include eBay, Tesla and Coca-cola, and locally, Cellcard, Chip Mong Group and Sathapana Bank. We're the strategic partner and developers of Cellcard's Pouk Mak app, the first messaging app made by Cambodians, for Cambodians. By year-end, we will become an international software company with offices in Phnom Penh, Singapore and the United States.

Job Description:
- Participate in the conduct of internal audit to the branch and head office and ensure high quality of the audit conduct
- Provide immediate recommendation as the result of both the compliances, risk and operational audits
- Assist the Senior Internal Audit Officer in the data collection and preparation of working document
- Preparation of draft internal audit report on own findings and report to the Senior Internal Audit Officer
- Ensure constant capacity building and up-to-date of AMK’s performance
- Other tasks required by the HIA/DHIA/SIAO.

**** AMK offers a competitive salary, performance incentive, Khmer New Year bonus, pension fund benefit, accident insurance, full medical cost reimbursement for employee, spouse, and dependent.  Working conditions are complied with Cambodian labor law.
Job Requirement:
- BBA in banking/finance, accounting, business or economics, preferably a specialized accounting degree.
- At least two years of experience of finance/account in the microfinance/banking/audit sector or as internal auditor is an advantage or about 3 years’ experience of others such as Credit Officers in MFIs.
- Good understanding of Cambodian and international accounting principles and standards. 
- Good computer skills (i.e. Microsoft Office) and good understanding of CBS system or other specific MIS for MFIs.
- Ability to write timely, clear and concise reports on the findings.

Job Description:
- Preparation of individual audit planning – data collection, define key risk concerns, compile activities chart, etc. and reviewing the work plan of Branch Internal Audit Officers
- Taking lead of the individual internal audit team in each audit as well as full support to the Branch Internal Audit Officers
- Supervision and monitoring of works performed by the team members and BIAOs
- Review of works performed by the team members and BIAOs
- Review of reporting output prepared by team members and BIAOs
- Preparation of the consolidated internal audit reports and BIAOs reports
- Maximizing effectiveness of the audit results through participation in the management meeting - debriefing
- Follow up on audit findings and its status of implementations with the audit targets
- Provide training to the team members when deem necessary, provide effective coaching to ensure effective knowledge exchange and internal audit quality in its process and output
- Ensure that all audit activities are monitored and its status be tracked against individual audit plan – audit commencement date, completion date of the audit field works, meeting notes etc.
- Ensure that all working practices at all stages are in line with the approved Internal Audit Policies in term of quality control procedures, sampling procedures, audit testing procedures etc.
- Actively involved in discussion of audit findings and its status, provide feedback on effectiveness of post- audit corrections process and give recommendation for changes

*** AMK offers a competitive salary, performance incentive, Khmer New Year bonus, pension fund benefit, accident insurance, full medical cost reimbursement for employee, spouse, and dependent.  Working conditions are complied with Cambodian labor law.
Job Requirement:
- BBA in banking/finance, accounting, business or economics, preferably a specialized accounting degree.
- At least two years of experience in internal audit in the microfinance/banking/audit sector or 4 years’ experience of finance/accounting in the microfinance/banking/audit sector.
- Good understanding of Cambodian and international accounting principles and standards. 
- Strong computer skills (i.e. Microsoft Office) and good understanding of CBS system or other specific MIS for MFIs.
- Ability to write timely, clear and concise reports on the findings.
- Excellent written and spoken English, as well as communication and interpersonal skills.
- High motivation and ability to work without supervision and willing to travel to the provinces.

*** Interested candidates should apply by sending a CV and a cover letter to: AMK branch and sub-branch offices or Head Office, Building 285, YothapolKhemarakPhoumin Blvd. (271), Sk. TomnubTuek, Kh. Chamkarmorn, Phnom Penh, Cambodia or E-mail: recruitment@amkcambodia.com

Job Description:
Our client is an enterprise created to incorporate its branded chain of subsidiaries including supermarket, Quick Service Restaurants and Guardian.Currently, we are looking for the potential candidate to fulfill the position of Category Manager (Health).

+ Responsibilities :
1.Sales Generation
-  Generate sales by ensuring that the Guardian target customers are provided with the products and services that they want.
- Seek innovative products sourced throughout the world to provide newness, differentiation and interest in the Guardian offer.
- Develop attractive and interesting promotional events which follow pre agreed selling plan
- Work closely with retail and sales management to ensure that store layouts. Promotions and display techniques are effective in maximizing sales and profit from the specific merchandise categories.
- Keep abreast of retail environment by paying regular visits to stores and competitors and take appropriate action to ensure competitive advantage is maintained.
- Develop cataloguing matrix to ensure that varying customers’ needs are satisfied in different localities. 

2.Profit Generation
- Establish and maintain effective margin and price controls which maximize business profits whilst delivering a good value offer to the customer.
- Negotiate and work with vendors to build mutually beneficial relationships to ensure long term strategic partnership, leading to lower costs and higher margin.
- Maximize profit by utilizing category management techniques to manage assortments, pricing and promotion.

3.Stock Control
- Manage stock levels and mark-downs to ensure that product availability is high yet ensure that cash flows is maximized controlling stock levels in both warehouse and stores within set targets.
- Establish and maintain effective SKU control.

4.Supplier Management
Develop and manage strategic partnerships with key suppliers to create win-win strategic relationships.
5.System and People
- Actively exploit benefits of new merchandise management system ensuring sales, profit and costs are effectively managed.
- Develop and train Subordinates ensuring that they are customer and product focused
- Manage performance through the setting and reviewing of individual’s performance
- Build an effective and open working relationship both within the Merchandise Department and with other Departments.
- Assert a high level of administrative control to ensure the smooth running of the specific Merchandise Department.

6.Decision Making Authority:
- Buying for responsible categories
- Vendor negotiations on margin, promotions and listings
= Retail pricing
- In-store display for relevant categories

7.Major Problems/Challenges:
- The successful implementation and use of new merchandise system.
- Understanding category management approach to buying

+ Requirements:
- Bachelor degree in Pharmacy or other relevant fields
- At least 1 year experience in pharmacy
- Passionate, energetic and action orientated
- Influencing skills, analytically, customer centered, open to change, well planned
- Strong sourcing networking and strong contractual management

+ Conditions and benefits:
- Salary : $100 up
- Working Day: Monday - Saturday
- Working Time: 8:00am～12:00am | 1:00pm～5:00pm
- Holiday : Saturday and Sunday

Job Description:
1.负责公司航线网络布局，编制公司航班计划
2.负责因飞机限制，机场、市场等因素引起的航班计划的调整与发布。
3.负责航线经营权与航班时刻的申请和报批工作。
4.负责收集局方相关政策及航权、时刻信息。
5.负责加班、包机计划的报批、发布和落实。
6.负责在FOC系统录入中长期航班计划

1. Responsible for route network layout and company flight plan preparation.
2. Responsible for adjustment and publishing flight plans which are caused by restrictions of aircraft , airports , markets and other factors.
3. Responsible for the application for operating routes and flight schedules.
4. Responsible for collecting the relevant policies and air traffic rights and relevant information .
5. Responsible for overtime, charter plan approval , publication and implementation.
6. Responsible for entering long-term flight plan in the FOC system.
Job Requirement:
专业：营销、管理类、数学、统计类相关专业
工作经验：民航一年以上经验
年龄：30岁以下
岗位知识：熟悉局方对航班安排的政策要求，熟悉航班安排程序，了解机组机务相关部门工作。
岗位资质：有责任心、事业心，属于沟通、熟练应用办公软件，有一定的中文、英文水平。

-Professional in Marketing , Management , Mathematics, Statistics or related fields.
-More than 1 year experience in civil aviation
-Age: Under 30 years old
-Knowledge of position: with the Bureau of flight arrangements, flight arrangement procedures, and understand maintenance related work.
-Job's intelligence: Responsible, professional ambition good communication skills
-Good Chinese and English
Company Profile:
巴戎航空倡导多元化的人力资源管理理念，提供国际化的薪酬福利待遇，努力为每一名员工提供广阔的个人发展空间。真诚地欢迎各位优秀的民航专业人士加盟巴戎航空，为发展柬埔寨民航运输业贡献自己的力量，在巴戎航空成就辉煌的人生理想！ 以下各部门岗位，诚招英才！欢迎您加盟巴戎航空！ 有意者请将求职信和个人简历(With Photo)发送至hr@bayonairlines.com 或将个人资料(With Photo)邮寄至柬埔寨巴戎航空公司。

Bayon Airlines advocates diverse Human Resources management concept. We provide standard salary and benefits, trying to provide opportunities for each employee for development. We sincerely welcome all interested candidates to join Bayon Airlines in order to make contribution to the development of Cambodia Civil Aviation industry as well as your own life achievement. Now we are recruiting staff for the following positions. Interested candidates please send your cover letter and resume (with photo) and send to hr@bayonairlines.com

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

Job Description:
Do you want to make a real difference in some of Cambodia’s poorest communities? Now is your chance to become part of VSO’s worldwide volunteering experience International Citizen Service (ICS). 
In Cambodia, ICS runs projects in the north-eastern part of the country.  Together with 12 other young Cambodians, you will spend three months working alongside twelve youth from the United Kingdom (UK) in a team to tackle issues that really matter to the local community. We are currently recruiting for our next cycle, which will start in march 2015. Please visit http://www.volunteerics.org/vso-cambodia for more information on the program. 

ICS is an opportunity to develop valuable life skills and gain some amazing experiences. As an ICS volunteer, you will:
- Develop skills in English language, teamwork, communication, monitoring and evaluation,  problem-solving, leadership, (project) management, facilitation, presentation skills, field work, and writing reports   
- Live alongside a counterpart from the UK in a host home in the community and gain more understanding about cross culture communication
- Receive a monthly allowance of $US 128 (plus medical insurance and accommodation) 
- Receive a certificate of completion at the end (useful for your future career)

តើអ្នកចង់ធ្វើឲ្យមានការផ្លាស់ប្តូរនៅក្នុងសហគមន៍ក្រីក្រដែរឬទេ? ឥទ្បូវនេះជាឳកាសក្នុងការទទួលយកបទពិសោធន៍ស្ម័គ្រចិត្តក្នុងកម្មវិធីប្រជាពលរដ្ឋសកល (ICS) របស់អង្គការVSO។ នៅកម្ពុជា ICS ដំណើរការគម្រោងនៅភូមិភាគឦសាននៃប្រទេស។ យុវជនកម្ពុជាចំនួន 12នាក់ នឹងធ្វើការជាក្រុមរយៈពេល 3ខែជាមួយយុវជន 12នាក់ ដែលមកពីចក្រភពអង់គ្លេសក្នុងការដោះស្រាយរាល់បញ្ហាផ្សេងៗដែលប៉ៈពាល់ដល់សហគមន៍។ យើងកំពុង           ជ្រើសរើស អ្នកស្ម័គ្រចិត្តសម្រាប់វគ្គដែលចាប់ផ្តើមក្នុង ខែមិនា ឆ្នាំ២០១៥។ ព័ត៏មានបន្ថែមនៃកម្មវិធីសូមចូល http://www.volunteerics.org/vso-cambodia.
ICS គឺជាឱកាសតែមួយគត់ ដើម្បីអភិវឌ្ឍនូវជំនាញជីវិត ហើយទទួលបាននូវបទពិសោធន៍ដ៏អស្ចារ្យ។ អ្នកស្ម័គ្រចិត្ត ICS នឹងទទួលបាន៖
- ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍ជំនាញ ភាសាអង់គ្លេស ក្រុមការងារ ការទំនាក់ទំនងការតាមដាន និង វាយតម្លៃ ការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា ភាពជាអ្នកដឹកនាំ ការគ្រប់គ្រង (គម្រោង) ការសម្របសម្រួល ការធ្វើបទបង្ហាញ ការងារក្នុងសហគមន៍ និង ការសរសេររបាយការណ៍
- 	ការរស់នៅក្នុងផ្ទះសហគមន៍ជាមួយដៃគូ ដែលមកពីចក្រភពអង់គ្លេស និង យល់ដឹងពីទំនាក់ទំនងចំរុះវប្បធម៏
- ការទទួលបានប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភចំនួន 128 ដុល្លារ ក្នុងមួយខែ (រួមទាំងធានារាប់រងសុខភាព និងការស្នាក់នៅ)

Job Description:
Our client is micro finance company located in Phnom Penh, Cambodia. Currently, we are seeking for the qualified candidate to fulfill the position of Credit Officers.

- Promote products and services
- Handle credit enquiries and applications
- Collect and investigate documents and information for credit assessment

Job Description:
• Develop, manage and coordinate the activities of facilities, design professionals and vendors to ensure that facilities services, maintenance, upkeep and planning of upgrading of assets are completed within time, cost, and quality constraints. 
• Procurement and management of vendor services. 
• Ensure bidding and award of contract service procedure is followed appropriately. 
•Resolve schedule and budget issues in a timely fashion on facility projects. 
• Participate in final inspections, ensure all deficiencies are remedied, and coordinate final acceptance by user. 
• Supervise subordinate personnel including: hiring, determining workload and delegating assignments, training, monitoring and evaluating performance, and initiating corrective or disciplinary actions. 
• Manage the personnel responsible for the upkeep and appearance of the facility and grounds. 
• Ensure that all vendors and on-site vendors procured by the Facilities Manager are aware of and adhere to all Company Safety Procedures and they so signify by signing the proper documentation. 
• Interface with other departments, vendors and supplier personnel. 
• Responsible for department budget process and audit the same to ensure that goals are met. 
• Responsible for effective communications levels and foster team building. 
• Responsible for adherence to all safety procedures and good housekeeping standards. 
• Identify and recommend opportunities for cost savings. 
• Build a strong facilities team in order to support it operationally.
Job Requirement:
• Male or Female 
• Bachelor’s degree and 05 years of facilities management experiences 
• Proven organizational and supervisory skills. 
• Excellent understanding of computer applications. 
• Engineering/mechanical background, Facility Maintenance, Safety,Health & Environment, Security or Janitorial Services. 
• Strong interpersonal skills and ability to work in a team environment 
• Responsibility for follow-up on actions based on various team projects 
• Building strong internal and external relationships using effective verbal and written communication skill 
• Develop and execute strategies for office centers and facilities. 
• Problem solving skills 
• Must be a provider of excellent customer service

Job Description:

-ពង្រឹង និងពង្រីកទីផ្សារផលិតផលជាប្រចំាថ្ងៃ
-រៀបចំការលក់ឲ្យមានភាពទាក់ទាញ
-រាយការណ៍ដល់ប្រធានផ្នែករាល់បញ្ហាដែលមិនអាចដោះស្រាយបាន
-កិច្ចការផ្សេងទៀតត្រូវធ្វើតាមគម្រោងដែលថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំរៀបចំ

-ផ្តល់អទិភាពដល់អ្នកមានបទពិសោធន៍។
-ចំណាំ៖ បុគ្គលិកទាំងអស់នឹងទទួលបានការហ្វឹកហាត់បន្ថែមមុននឹងធ្វើការ។

3. Ensure appearance, cleanliness and set-up of the restaurant is properly maintained. Maintain the lighting level as prescribed by the management.  Co-ordinate day and night clean up.
4. Work closely with the Restaurant Manager to provide customer feedback on food, beverage and service.
5. Assure damaged utensils are not used for serving.  Check maintenance of all equipment and fittings and request for immediate repairs as required.  Make every attempt to prevent the loss or damage of the restaurant’s property.
6. Work closely with restaurant manager in determining which menu items are most saleable, highlight guests’ criticism on quality of food, its temperature and appearance.
7. Encourage promising employees and identify those who are capable of taking more responsibilities.
8. Always on the alert for ways and means by which the Food and Beverage operation in the restaurant could be improved and to generate more profit.
9. Delegate duties to selected staff and follow up periodically.
10. Take note of special guests making reservations and alert all staff.
11. Conduct weekly meetings to brief staff on update of events.
12. Greet customers upon entry to the restaurant is a top priority. Ensure 1 staff always mans the entrance. Other staff must be briefed to welcome customers in the absence of the staff at the entrance.
13. In the absence of the Restaurant Manager, the Assistant Restaurant Manager will assume his responsibilities and duties.
Job Requirement:
- Minimum 3+ years relevant working experience in F&B industry in a supervisory role.
- Excellent knowledge of all aspects of restaurant management.
- Strong leadership skills with initiative.
- Strong interpersonal, communication and Management skills.
- Good knowledge of advertisement and promotion.
- Strong in Customer Service and problem solving skills.
- Good knowledge of Restaurant administrations.
- Good Knowledge of Microsoft Office applications.
- Patient, able to work under pressure and willing to learn.
- Must be fluent (speaking, writing, & reading) in English and Khmer language (Ability to speak Japanese/Chinese is an advantage)

Job Description:
Our client is Phnom Penh’s most prestigious commercial address. Rising to 187.3m, this landmark development is designed and constructed to the highest international standards for Cambodia’s emerging business and leisure community. Currently, we are seeking qualified candidate to fill the position Sales Fashion.

+ Responsibilities:
- Greeted customers and determined their needs and wants
- Asking questions and listening to customer’s needs, then giving options and advice on meeting those needs.
- Discussed type, quality and number of merchandise required for purchase
- Recommended merchandise based on individual requirements
- Provided advice to customers regarding particular products or services
- Explained the use and advantage of merchandise to customers
- Answered customers’ queries and concerns
- Assisted in display of merchandise. Maintained sales records for inventory control
- Maintaining selling floor presentations, and restocking them as needed
- Handle all returns courteously and professionally. Responsible for achieving personal sales goals
- Maintain a professional attitude with sincerity and enthusiasm reflecting the commitment to our customer – the most important person in our stores
- Be knowledgeable of and perform sales support functions related to POS procedures
- Be aware of current promotional events and sales. Maintain good housekeeping standards
- Regular, dependable attendance and punctuality

+ Requirements:
- Previous retail sales experience is preferred
- Basic math functions, ability to use a calculator and calculate percentages and ratios
- Available to work a variety of hours, which may include early morning, evening, weekends and overnight shifts.

+ Conditions and Benefits:
- Working time: 7:00am-12:00am | 1:00pm-4:00pm
- Working days: Monday-Sunday
- Holidays: Legal holidays
- Salary is negotiable

Job Description:
-Setup and maintain proper documentation of deployment system.
-Responsible for physical installation, modification, testing and servicing of data/network communication equipment at Head Office, Disaster & Recovery Site, Branches and Sub Branches including firewall, routers, switches, and ISP backbone.
-Regularly support, maintenance and troubleshoot LAN, WAN and IT security in HQ, DR, and Branch/Sub branch office.
-Perform analysis of network security needs and contribute to design, integration, and installation of hardware and software.
-Prepare installation plan and on-going budget for Data Center maintenance including Fire Suppression (FM-200), Cooling System, UPS and NetBotz Data Center Monitoring Appliance.
-Perform analysis, troubleshoot and correct network problems remotely as well as on site
-Negotiate with providers (ISP) for new connection, relocation and termination.
-Planning, Designing, and developing Inter-networking that would be integrated with team IT Platform as required by Company.
-Support Technical Section for advanced problem that rose by Technical Support Engineers.
-To take an active role in the technology transfer process
-Substantial contribution of professional quality outputs
-Participates in teamwork and supports colleagues
-To be proactive in responding to user issues and maintain “sense of urgency” at all time
Job Requirement:
-Bachelor degree in Computer Science/Related field or higher
-At least 2 year experience in IT Network, Technical Support in Bank/MFI or ISP is preferred.
- At least 1 year experience with Mikrotik Router such as routing protocol (Static, Dynamic & Routing Rule), VPN Technologies using IPSec, GRE, MPLS, EoIP , Bonding, QoS (Simple Queues, Queues Tree and Mangle), NAT, PAT, Static NAT (Port Forwarding), High Ability with VRRP, and Load Balancing technique.
-Strong understanding of Network Infrastructure for LAN, WAN, VPN and Firewall appliance including Cisco firewall and CheckPoint firewall.
-Good understanding of Cisco switch L2, L3 is preferred.
-Good knowledge of system monitoring such as Solarwind, Cacti, Nagios, SmokePing, Syslog server and other monitor tools is desirable.
Sound knowledge of Unix and Windows 2008/2012, OS including Active Directory & DNS.
-Willing to work under pressure and travelling in provincial
-Good communication, facilitation and good interpersonal skills
-Good written and spoken English
-Prior experience with a 24/7 technical operational environment is highly desired
Honest, hardworking and be able to work under pressure and over time
Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

Currently, we are seeking for qualified candidate to fill the position Outsourced Services Manager.

+ Responsibilities:
- Be responsible for the structure and normal operation of the entire finance/ accounting system

- Degree in CA, ACCA or international equivalent certificate, or be an excellent professional in the final stages of completion
- At least 5 years of relevant experience in the same position and must possess the required qualifications and competencies consistent with our competency framework
- Excellent knowledge of accounting and professional standards and tax laws

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

Job Description:
Our client is an international, non-profit humanitarian organization that plans, implements, and raises funds for the provision of services in child education, community development, health, sanitation, and disaster relief projects. We are now seeking for qualified candidate to fill the position Water Purifier Project Facilitator.

+ Responsibilities:
- Plan and organize Water Purifier distribution to the pilot project partners in the communities.
- Educate the project participants on the correct methods of Water Purifier maintenance.
- Build close relationships and actively learn within communities through home visits with project partners, attending community social events etc.
- Conduct meetings with community to find out resources, management, guidelines in place, relationship, role & responsibilities, successes & challenges …etc.)
- Regularly/continually monitoring the implementation of the Water Purifier facilities construction, ensuring that contractors are working to achieve standard.
- Mainstream hygiene/sanitation issues and environment into the project implementation.
- Monitor a project activities and outputs in order to ensure accountability and outcome of project.
- Disseminate key lessons of water purifier and strategies towards relevant stakeholders.
- Participate in practitioner networks/working group, as assigned by the CDP manager to ensure ongoing learning on good practice and standards relevant to the assigned project.

+ Requirements:
- At least 1-year work experiences in WASH.
- Experience in project planning, implementation, monitoring, evaluation, and report writing.
- Good interpersonal, communication and problem solving skills.

+ Conditions and Benefits:
- Working time: 8:00am-12:00am | 1:00pm-5:00pm
- Working days: Monday-Friday
- Holidays: Saturday, Sunday & Legal Holidays
- 24 Insurance
- Provident Found 5%
- Phone Allowance
- 13 Month
- Salary range: $400-$500

job title: អ្នកចែកបៀរ (Dealer)
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន​ ហ្វុង ហ័ង ( Feng huang)
position: អ្នកចែកបៀរ (Dealer)
Job Description:
ក្រុមហ៊ុន​ ហ្វុង ហ័ង ( Feng huang) កំសាន្តត្រូវការជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកអ្នកចែកបៀ តាមអ៊ិនធឺណែត (Dealer Online)

凤凰娱乐招聘高端网络荷官（牌手）

ត្រូវការជ្រើសរើស អ្នកចែកបៀរ (Dealer) ច្រើន​នាក់៖  អ្នកមានបទពិសោធន៍បានមានអាទិភាពអ្នកមិនទាន់មានបទពិសោធន៍​ បានផ្តល់ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល។

诚聘牌手多名：有经验优先，没有经验提供培训
Job Requirement:
តម្រូវការ៖  要求：

● បេក្ខនារី ត្រូវមានអាយុ ចាប់ពី 18 – 28 ឆ្នាំ មានរូបសម្បត្តិ ​ស្អាត សមរម្យ និង​​ រូសរាយ​​​ រាក់ទាក់​ ត្រូវមានកំពស់ចាប់ពី 1.58cm​ ឡើងទៅ​​ ។

● 女性19--28岁，美丽大方，气质优雅，身高1.58以上。

បញ្ជាក់៖  

បណ្តុះបណ្តា និង ការសាកល្បងរយៈពេល ១ ខែ ។  ប្រាក់ខែក្នុងកំឡុងពេល 250 ដុលា្ល បន្ទាប់ពីពេញសិទ្ឋិ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​សាកល្បងបានប្រាក់ខែ 300​ ដុលា្ល ។  ធ្វើការ​ប្រាំបួន​ម៉ោងក្នុងមួយថ្ងៃ ត្រូវការ​ផ្លាស់ប្តូរ​វេន សម្រាក​បួនថ្ងៃ​ក្នុងមួយខែ ។  អាចទទួលលុយថីព នៅក្នុងអំឡុងពេលប្រតិបត្ដិការ លុយថីពទាំងអស់ជាកម្មសិទ្ធិដោយ​អ្នកចែកបៀ ទាំងអស់​ ។ ​បរិភោគ និង ស្នាក់នៅលើ ក្រុមហ៊ុន បុគ្គលិក​ដែលប្រសើរ​ នឹងទទួលរង្វាន់ពីក្រុមហ៊ុននេះ ។

- 待遇：培训+试用期1个月，期间工资250元，转正后工资300，每天工作9小时，需要轮班，每月休息 4天。工作期间可收取小费，所收取小费全部归牌手所有。公司包吃住，表现突出者可获公司奖励。 

ទីតាំង​សំភាសន៍ ៖面试地点：

- ​​​ថ្ងៃ​ ទី​​ ៩ ដល់​​ ទី១១​ បីថ្ងៃជារៀងរាល់ខែ ថ្ងៃ​ ទី​៩ នាពេលម៉ោង ១ ថ្ងៃត្រង់ ​ដល់ ម៉ោង ៥ រសៀល ​ថ្ងៃ ទី១០​ និង ១១ នាពេលម៉ោង ៩​ព្រឹក ​ដល់ ម៉ោង ៥ រសៀល ​​ បេក្ខនារី យក​ប្រវត្តិរូប(CV) និង អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណមកសម្ភាសន៍​នៅ ក្នុងឡប់ប៊ីសណ្ឋាគារ ភ្នំពេញ ។ អាសយដ្ឋាន ៖ លេខ 53 មហាវិថីមុនីវង្ស សង្កាត់ ស្រះចក ខណ្ឌដូនពេញ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ ។

- 每月9 - 11号3天在金边大酒店大厅，9号中午1点–下午5点，10号、11号早上9点 －下午5点 面试。地址：金边市莫尼旺大道门牌53号，隆边郡沙卓区。

- ឬមកសម្ភាសន៍នៅការិយាល័យផ្នែកOnline នៅជាន់ទី ៥ ក្នុងកស៊ីណូGood Luck ក្រុងបាវិត ។

- 或在柴桢省柬-越边境巴域市Good Luck Casino(好运娱乐赌场)5楼 519房面试。

Job Description:
Our client is the manufacturer of international quality beers such as Tiger beer, Anchor beer, ABC Extra Stout & Gold Crown. Currently, we are seeking for qualified candidate to fill the position Brand Manager.

+ Responsibilities:
- Plan and implement various marketing projects and activities for assigned brand. -
- Implement marketing plans within allocated brand budget and provide feedback to marketing manager on the execution of approved plans/activities.
- Monitor brand health performance, i.e. track throughput sales, and revise brand plans, as appropriate.
- Maintain close collaboration with brand’s promotion agency, advertising agency, and other cross-functional groups to establish short- and long-term brand performance goals and ensure successful plan development and execution.
- Work with relevant staff members to develop a comprehensive program to complement the activities of the sales teams and support the promotion of assigned brand(s); work with sales teams to identify, design and create selling tools.
- Coordinate with relevant operational personnel, i.e. sales, corporate communications, purchasing, finance, packaging, warehouse, etc., on execution of promotion mechanics and logistics, to ensure minimum disruption to work-in-progress via timely briefings and orderly execution and management.
- Coordinate the post-evaluation of marketing events and analyze available market and consumer research information and contribute to the development of the annual brand plan. 
- Perform detailed business performance analysis of responsible brand(s) as well as competitive products, summarize performance trends, identify key drivers, and formulate action plans, as appropriate.

+ Requirements:
- 3 to 5 years of brand marketing experience with all exposure to all elements in the marketing mix.
- Ability to identify or determine key priorities and brand needs.
- Ability to translate marketing strategy into tactics and ideas into action.
- Good command of spoken and written English 
- Good computer knowledge, Ms office applications and design software
- Superior communication skills; excellent verbal and presentation skills.
- Strong interpersonal skills with a focus on teamwork.
- Ability to communicate and work with a variety of personalities.
- Self-motivated and proactive professional.
- Creative and an eye for detail.
- Flexibility and adaptability.
- Result-oriented and meeting datelines.

+ Conditions and Benefits:
- Working time: 9:00-17:30
- Working days: Monday-Friday
- Holidays: Saturday, Sunday & Legal Holidays
- Salary range: $1200-$1500
- Other Benefit and allowance

Job Description:
1.Scope of working:

The Marketing Officer oversees the company’s marketing campaigns both internally and externally and plays a key part in communicating the organizations marketing message

2.Duties & responsibilities:

- Preparing, planning and project managing the publication of all publicity material to maximise brand promotion.
- Creating marketing campaigns and working with the company's external PR agency to see them executed.
- Creating and developing new innovative ways to communicate the company message to their existing customers.
- Contributing to the annual sales and marketing plan.
- Planning and project managing marketing events and evaluating their success.
- Evaluating the effectiveness of all marketing activity.
- Developing and implementing an internal marketing programme.
- Supporting the marketing manager in day to day marketing activities.
- Plan, develop and deliver campaigns as agreed within timescales.


3.Working Days and Hours:
- Monday to Saturday: 8:00am to 12:00pm & 1:00pm to 5:00pm
- Lunch time: 12:00pm to 1:00pm

4.Work place:
- Marketing Officer is based in Head Office, the department of Sale and Marketing

5.Relationship:
- Marketing Officer works under supervise & report directly to Marking Supervisor

6.Salary and Benefit:
- Salary (Negotiation)
- Lunch
- Uniform 
- 13rd months’ salary
- 100-300 percent of annual incentive
- And others
Job Requirement:
7.Qualification & requirement:

- A bachelor's degree in marketing, business administration or a similar skill.
- 1 or more years of work experience of marketing with real estate / private company.
- Have knowledge of a marketing techniques and concepts
- Be an excellent communicator and think creatively 
- Design skills including graphics, adobe Photoshop,  Illustrator and SPSS
- Work well in a team and be well presented with a professional manner

Job Description:
1. Scope of working:

Internal Stock Auditor protects assets by planning and completing inventory audits; identifying inadequate, inefficient, or ineffective internal stock controls; recommending improvements as well as maintain the accuracy of the inventory for the planning and forecasting groups. 


2. Duties & responsibilities:

- Plans inventory audits by understanding BOREY PENG HUOTH objectives, structure, policies, processes, internal controls, and external regulations; identifying risk areas; preparing audit scope and objectives; preparing audit programs.

- Assesses compliance with inventory regulations and controls by auditing all physical inventory, examining and analyzing records as well as operating practices to reduce errors in inventory accuracy. 

- Assesses risks and internal controls by identifying areas of non-compliance; evaluating manual and automated inventory processes; identifying process weaknesses and inefficiencies and operational issues.

- Improves protection by identifying root causes and recommending changes in management monitoring, assessment in the internal control structure and in operating processes.

- Protects BOREY PENG HUOTH's reputation by keeping information confidential and perform other tasks assign by direct manager.

3. Working Days and Hours

- Monday to Saturday: 	8:00am to 12:00pm & 1:00pm to 5:00pm

- Lunch time: 		12:00pm to 1:00pm

4. Work place

- Internal Stock Auditor is based in Head Office, the department of Inventory.

5. Relationship

- Internal Stock Auditor works under supervise & report directly to Procurement Director

6. Salary and Benefit

- Salary (Negotiation)
- Lunch
- Uniform 
- 13rd months’ salary
- 100-300 percent of annual incentive
- Education Sponsorship
Job Requirement:
7. Qualification & requirement:

- A bachelor's degree in Accounting or a similar skill.
- 1 or more years of work experience of real estate/private Company.
- Computer literacy especially MS Office, Accounting System
- Good analyzing Information , Research Skills, Reporting Research Results
- Good verbal Communication
- Attention to Detail, Objectivity

Job Description:
We seek for the high-skilled and motivated staffs for our clients' companies in various industry, in several position specialized as below.

-	Web Developer
-	Network Developer
Job Requirement:
Web Developer
-	BA Degree of IT or equivalent.
-	1-3 years hands-on experience in programming and coding using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Java, etc.
-	Experiences in CMS such as Joomla, Wordpress, etc.
-	Database: Access, SQL, Oracle, MyAdmin, etc.
-       Good skills of Linux Server
-       Experience of Agile development

Network Develpper
-	BA Degree of IT or equivalent; CCNA, CCNP certified is a strong advantage.
-	Understand, diagnose, and troubleshoot TCP/IP fundamentals, network routing protocols (OSPF, BGP, MPLS) and physical infrastructure.
-	Able to decipher and correct Unix/Linux coding/scripting .
-	In-depth experience on Switches, Routers, Hubs, Server, Cable, Racks, Firewall, LAN, WAN, TCP/IP, DNS, UDP, Latency, VOIP, QoS, EIGRP, BGP, OSPF, MPLS.
-	Must have working experience with Cisco equipment (routers, switches, firewall).
-	Technical Field Manager, Technical Service Officer.


How to Apply

If you are interested, please send us your resume.
If you pass the paper screening, we will contact you for the interview.
Please put the information as below, otherwise you will not pass to the interview.

- Professional Cover Letter
- Comprehensive Resume
- With recent Photo
- State your expected Salary
- State the position your applying for (indicated above)

Attractive compensation and benefits awaits those who pass these requirements.

Job Description:
-	Define the product strategy, planning, execution sale and tracking of direct mail and package insert campaigns for products
-	Providing the sales team with the necessary technical expertise to enable them to sell the truck
-	Set-up, manage and improve standards and procedures within the team 
-	Ensure working practices are well defined and operational with minimal disruption using technology to improve efficiency as appropriate 
-	Manage the team and individual performance, technical and skills development 
-	Encourage open communication between team members, suggesting and driving forward ideas about how the team can work more effectively together
-	Execute sales plan to target agricultural prospects with a view to on-going relationships as a key supplier
-	Preparation of costing sheets and quotations to all prospective customers
-	Preparation of sales forecasts & budgets to meet targets
-	Strive for best practices in customer satisfaction & support with regular updates to management
-	Carry out field demonstrations as required
-	Monitor customer’s technical requirements and feed information back to technical manager
-	Achieve a bottom line growth in line with business plan
-	Achieve Sales KPI’s.
Job Requirement:
-	At least bachelor degree level in Mining, Mechanical Engineering, and or Business/Commerce 
-	Minimum of 5-year experiences in sales management and small sales force management in heavy equipment, especially truck sales 
-	Experience in working for/with Major International Mining/Construction Companies or OEM supplier
-	Ability to learn systems to run campaign calculations and product consolidations 
-	Ability to interact effectively with people in various functions and at all levels of the organization. 
-	Good in communication with the clients by the phone or face to face
-	Ability to travel alone  or with team to the provinces or others urban areas
-	Good English & Khmer, written & spoken. Thai & Chinese languages would also be considered
-	Candidate with experiences in similar industries would be advantage 
-	A good package will be offered with basic salary plus commission and annual bonus

Job Description:
-	Define the product strategy, planning, execution sale and tracking of direct mail and package insert campaigns for products
-	Providing the sales team with the necessary technical expertise to enable them to sell the truck
-	Set-up, manage and improve standards and procedures within the team 
-	Ensure working practices are well defined and operational with minimal disruption using technology to improve efficiency as appropriate 
-	Manage the team and individual performance, technical and skills development 
-	Encourage open communication between team members, suggesting and driving forward ideas about how the team can work more effectively together
-	Execute sales plan to target agricultural prospects with a view to on-going relationships as a key supplier
-	Preparation of costing sheets and quotations to all prospective customers
-	Preparation of sales forecasts & budgets to meet targets
-	Strive for best practices in customer satisfaction & support with regular updates to management
-	Carry out field demonstrations as required
-	Monitor customer’s technical requirements and feed information back to technical manager
-	Achieve a bottom line growth in line with business plan
-	Achieve Sales KPI’s.
Job Requirement:
-	At least bachelor degree level in Mining, Mechanical Engineering, and or Business/Commerce 
-	Minimum of 5-year experiences in sales management and small sales force management in heavy equipment, especially truck sales 
-	Experience in working for/with Major International Mining/Construction Companies or OEM supplier
-	Ability to learn systems to run campaign calculations and product consolidations 
-	Ability to interact effectively with people in various functions and at all levels of the organization. 
-	Good in communication with the clients by the phone or face to face
-	Ability to travel alone  or with team to the provinces or others urban areas
-	Good English & Khmer, written & spoken. Thai & Chinese languages would also be considered
-	Candidate with experiences in similar industries would be advantage 
-	A good package will be offered with basic salary plus commission and annual bonus
Company Profile: HRINC is the leading provider of HR Services to the Cambodia market and expanding to the South East Asia region.  We support multinational companies and leading ASEAN conglomerates and SMEs with their Human Resource needs, from consulting and market intelligence, to outsourcing and compliance as well as recruitment.
Contact Info: Contact Information NGOL Kean (Mr.)  +855 (23) 211437  Building #10, Oknha Pich Avenue (Street 242), Sankat Chaktumok, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh  +855 (23) 211437

Job Description:
•	Can do BOQ ( Bill of Quality )
•	Can use AutoCAD, 3D
•	Directly manages the development of architectural designs and preliminary construction details.
•	Ensures architectural design work is completed on time and adheres to the established specifications and standards.
•	Prepare sketches, production drawings and detailed drawings by hand or using computer-aided design (CAD) software
•	Combine structural, mechanical and artistic elements into the building design, such as decks and atriums, lifts, air conditioning systems and decorative finishes
•	Discuss designs and cost estimates in the project, including engineers, quantity surveyors, landscape architects, and urban and regional planners
•	Observe, inspect and monitor building work to ensure it is progressing according to the specifications
•	Evaluate projects once they are completed and occupied.
•	Perform other related duties as required
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor Degree of Interior design / Architect or equivalent
•	Fresh graduated who have no experience will be considered 
•	Technical qualification in construction related discipline
•	Knowledge of general management skills for a construction project 
•	Knowledge about design and construction principals and drawing/workflow for admin, planning and drawing
•	Proficiency in spoken and written English with good interpersonal skills ( Chinese proficiency is preferable)
•	Proficiency in relevant office software ( Ms. office and able to use Auto Cad)

company_name: អង្គការអភិវឌ្ឍសេដ្ឋកិច្ចអាស៊ាន ( A.D.E )
Company Profile:
ASIAN DEVELOPING ECONOMICS ORGANIZATION   (CAMBODIA)

	-ជាទីប្រជុំក្រុមហ្រ៊ុនចំរុះជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក កម្មករ
	-ពិគ្រោះនិង ជួយសំរបសំរួលការងារជូនប្រជាជនកម្ពុជាដើម្ប
	ទទួលបានឱកាសការងារត្រឹមត្រូវ សមរម្យ និងឆាប់រហ័ស
	-ពិគ្រោះនិងបណ្តុះបណ្តាការងារដើម្បីធ្វើការនៅកម្ពុជា អាស៊ាន ជប៉ុន
-អង្គការយើងខ្ញុំមានលក់ កុំព្យូទ័រ ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រូជាក់ ប្រូចេចទ័រ ស្លាយបញ្ចាំ សូមទំនាក់ទំនងលេខទូរស័ព្ទៈ 096/097 8084 909
	វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាកពិសេស!
	សិក្សាការងារដើម្បីធ្វើជាកម្មសិក្សាបណ្តុះបណ្តាបច្ចេកទេស
	ការងារប្រទេសជប៉ុនរយៈពេល៣ឆ្នាំ/ប្រាក់ខែ1500-2500ដុល្លារ!

	អង្គការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលការងារក្នុងស្រុកនិងក្រៅស្រុកកសាង
	សមត្ដភាពការងារ និងស្មារតីការងារដើម្បីជួយពលរដ្ឋកម្ពុជាឈោង
	ចាប់ឱកាសការងារ អាស៊ាននិងជប៉ុន ថៃ ។ មានបើកវគ្គពិសេសគឺ 
	បណ្តុះបណ្តាលការងារនិងភាសាដើម្បីជួយដល់ យុវជន យុវនារី សិស្ស
	និស្សិត កម្មករ កម្មការិនី បានទៅសិក្សានិងធ្វើការប្រទេសជប៉ុន ថៃ។
    1.	រយៈពេលបណ្តុះបណ្តាល( 1-3ខែ)
    2.	ចុុះឈ្មោះពិនិត្យសុខភាពចំណាយអស់​ 50ដុល្លារ
    3.	កម្មវិធីបណ្តុះបណ្តោះ
         -វេនព្រឹក      ម៉ោង8-11
         -វេនល្ងាច     ម៉ោង2-5
         -វេនយប់	ម៉ោង6-8
 លក្ខ័ខណ្ឌជ្រើសរើស
-អាយុ 20 -30 ឆ្នាំ
-មានសុខភាពល្អ
-នៅលីវ
-ជាពលរដ្ឋខែ្មរ មានអត្តសញ្ញាណបណ្ណ័ និងសៀវភៅគ្រួសារ
