Job Description:
•	Be responsible for CCTV Solution from designing solutions deploying to post-sales technical supports.
•	Meet customers to understand their requirements
•	Support sales team on proposal and solutions to customer
•	General Bill of Material (BoM) for quotations/proposals
•	Assist P.O or sales in gathering 3rd party pricing or outsource 3rd party, if required
•	Establish and maintain strong relationship with key partners/vendors
•	Support sales team in bidding process
•	Demonstrate product solutions and update to customers  
•	Provide technical support to customers after sales is closed
Job Requirement:
•	University degree in Computer Science, Electronic or related field
•	Basic knowledge and understanding about Cambodia’s CCTV practices
•	Product certification is preferable
•	Relevant technical credential is preferable
•	At least 1 years of experience in CCTV system technical support or pre-sale engineering 
•	Experience in construction of technical solution for RFQ, RFP and Tender is preferable
•	Good written and spoken English, or other languages: Chinese/Vietnamese is preferable
•	Honesty, hard-working and result-oriented
•	Friendly and outgoing
Company Profile: AnAnA Computer Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 as one of Cambodia‘s first computer companies. Our track record and market experience has made us Cambodia‘s leading provider of total IT solutions, including systems integration, networking, hardware, and software. We offer competitive benefits packages and a good working environment, as well as future career development for our employees.

Job Description:
The Assistant General Manager Job Duties:
•	Establishes sales objectives by forecasting and developing annual sales quotas for regions and territories; projecting expected sales volume and profit for existing and new products.
•	Implements national sales programs by developing field sales action plans.
•	Maintains sales volume, product mix, and selling price by keeping current with supply and demand, changing trends, economic indicators, and competitors.
•	Establishes and adjusts selling prices by monitoring costs, competition, and supply and demand.
•	Completes national sales operational requirements by scheduling and assigning employees; following up on work results.
•	Maintains professional and technical knowledge by attending educational workshops; reviewing professional publications; establishing personal networks; participating in professional societies.
•	Develop relation network with customers, automotive workshops, and car dealers.
Job Requirement:
Skills/Qualifications: Meeting Sales Goals, Negotiation, Selling to Customer Needs, Motivation for Sales, Sales Planning, Building Relationships, Coaching, Managing Processes.
Five years experiences in automotive tires business  
Degree in Business and marketing or related field  
Knowledge of basic products (vehicles and services)
Good communication Skills (English)

Job Description:
•	In charge of the management of the company’s social media presence
•	Regularly update the company’s social media channels with relevant contents
•	Regularly sharing feedback and insights gained from social media management in relation to client needs with the Marketing team
•	Communicate with the audience and customers appropriately and in line with the company’s instructions 
•	Data segmentation and develop email lists.
•	Collaborate with external sources to encourage brand mentions on their platforms and via social media
•	Conduct competitor research
•	Project management
•	Leverage partnership relationships to maximize brand exposure
•	Liaise with external suppliers
•	Manage communication through all social media platforms and to administer the promotional calendar
•	Aid website merchandising and product presentation on the website as required
•	Support the marketing team with other marketing activities such as events, trade shows as required
Job Requirement:
•	The ideal candidate will be degree educated in Communication or related degree (or equivalent)
•	A minimum of 12 months marketing and communication experience
•	Capacity in copywriting (in English and Cambodian) and project management 
•	Experience in using online marketing tools such as social media in a professional capacity
•	Ability of multi-tasking, project management and first class communication skills (in English and Cambodian)
•	Proven track record in delivering successful marketing campaigns and achieving press coverage will be essential
•	Interest in IT sector preferable 
•	Personality wise, you will be a team player, enthusiastic, ambitious and proactive in your approach
•	Ability to work under pressure and to deadlines
•	Community management and social media experience, 2+ yrs work experience in related field. 
•	Strong Facebook, Google Plus and Twitter experience among other social channels
•	Coordinating social media editorial calendars & creating engaging content
Company Profile: AnAnA Computer Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 as one of Cambodia‘s first computer companies. Our track record and market experience has made us Cambodia‘s leading provider of total IT solutions, including systems integration, networking, hardware, and software. We offer competitive benefits packages and a good working environment, as well as future career development for our employees.
